senses.definition: 西洋音樂嘅一種#調性，大部份嘅音樂都係用呢種調性，通常比#小調 明朗。 ((of music) major)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: C 大調
examples.translation: C major

senses.definition: 搭交通工具嘅時候，應該畀錢但又唔畀 (to ride without paying; to evade a fare)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
比喻面部皮膚粗糙多班 (pitted skin; pock-marked; freckled face ; literally: bean curd skin)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你夜晚成日唔瞓覺，因住有豆皮面呀。
examples.jyutping: nei5 je6 maan5 seng4 jat6 m4 fan3 gaau3, jan1 zyu6 jau5 dau6 pei4 min6 aa3.
examples.translation: You seldom sleep at night, your face is going to resemble the surface of the moon.

senses.definition: 形容一樣物件嘅體積好細小。#豆潤 即係豆腐乾。因新鮮#豆腐 好快變壞, 啲板豆腐賣唔晒會攞去加工，壓水，有時會加#鹵水 煮，再焙乾或晒乾後成為一片片細塊，可以存放好耐。因豆腐壓去水份再煮會縮細好多，所以用來形容體積細小之物。 (to describe the smallness of something. Literally: as small as a dried bean curd. This comes from the fact that fresh bean curds rot very quickly, so for preservation purposes the unsold tofu are pressed under weight to remove water, sometimes boiled in tempered soy sauce, and finally dried by oven or sunlight. As dried bean curds shrink considerably, it has come to describe something that is tiny. Literally: as small as a dried bean curd cube)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我間屋好似豆潤咁細。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gaan1 uk1 hou2 ci5 dau6 jeon2 gam3 sai3
examples.translation: My apartment is as tiny as a dried bean curd.

senses.definition: 買賣、大生意，泛指賺好多錢嘅機會。 ((informal) big business deal; opportunity to earn a lot ; literally: big tea rice)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你幾時自立門户開公司啊？我諗住跟你食大茶飯㗎喇！
examples.jyutping: nei5 gei2 si4 zi6 laap6 mun4 wu6 hoi1 gung1 si1 aa3? ngo5 nam2 zyu6 gan1 nei5 sik6 daai6 caa4 faan6 gaa3 laa3!
examples.translation: When will your start your own business? I'm counting on you to earn big money together!

senses.definition: 打劫、販毒等嘅犯罪活動；多數會喺電影、電視劇入面聽到黑社會咁講（量詞：單） (criminal activity, especially with respect to triads)

examples.text: 食大茶飯

phonetic.original: daa2 laan6 saa1 pun4 man6 dou3 duk1
jyutping: daa2 laan6 saa1 pun4 man6 dou3 duk1

senses.definition: #尋根究底，咩嘢都問。 (to keep asking questions, to annoy someone by continuing to ask questions; literally: break the earthenware pot and it cracks to the bottom (question till the end))
senses.label: 語句

keywords: daa2 laan6 saa1 pun4 man6 dou3 duk1
daa laan saa pun man dou duk

senses.definition: 指「搭左一隻就嚟沉嘅船」，意即一項預計會失敗嘅投資：如投資一間破緊產嘅公司、組成一個無盈利嘅聯營、賭博時押注落輸緊果一方。 (to invest in a failing company, to join a doomed venture, to bet on a losing side. Literally: to take a sinking ship.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唉，今次搭沉船喇，原來間公司欠落一大筆債，我仲懵盛盛入左股添。
examples.translation: Damn, I've taken a sinking ship this time, I didn't recognize the company has a lot of debts, and I still stupidly invested in it.

senses.definition: 指「搭沉左人地隻船」，意即怪責新參與者帶來惡運，連累事項由原本無事變成失敗。 (to describe an unlucky new comer's joining have encumber the company, venture or other bets on the same side failed. Literally: the boarding has sunk the ship)

examples.text: 搞錯呀，次次都係你搭沉船，今次又累到我地輸晒喇！
examples.translation: What the hell, every time you're involved, we end up losing! This time, too, you've cost us everything!

senses.definition: 用嚟代替米飯作為主食或正餐 (used as a substitute for rice or regular meals.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 豆腐當飯食

senses.definition: 好重視某件事 (to take something seriously.)

examples.text: like數當飯食

senses.definition: 唔同人一齊行動，獨自一人 (lone wolf; to describe someone who likes to do things on their own)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢性格比較孤僻，鍾意獨來獨往，所以無乜朋友。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 sing3 gaak3 bei2 gaau3 gu1 pik1, zung1 ji3 duk6 loi4 duk6 wong5, so2 ji5 mou2 mat1 pang4 jau5
examples.translation: He is shy and quiet and prefers to be alone, so he doesn’t have many friends.

senses.definition: 將食剩嘅嘢包起帶走 (to pack up the remains of a meal when one eats out so that they can be brought to home ; literally: beat and wrap)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 食淨咗咁多嘢，拎個袋打包拎返屋企啦。
examples.jyutping: sik6 zing6 zo2 gam3 do1 je5, ling1 go3 doi2 daa2 baau1 ling1 faan1 uk1 kei2 laa1.
examples.translation: There is so much food left, let's take a doggy bag and bring them home.

senses.definition: （醫院術語）處理死者嘅程序，拎走屍體身上嘅嘢，幫屍體抹身同埋換上屍袍，放入屍袋運去殮房 (to wrap a corpse and prepare it in a mortuary just after a person died in a hospital so that it is kept and can be examined before the funeral)

examples.text: 記者去到醫院嗰時，姑娘已經同死者打咗包，送咗入殮房嘞。
examples.jyutping: gei3 ze2 heoi3 dou3 ji1 jyun2 go2 si2, gu1 noeng4 ji5 ging1 tung4 sei2 ze2 daa2 zo2 baau1, sung3 zo2 jap6 lim5 fong4 laak3.
examples.translation: The nurse has already wrapped the dead body with a shroud and sent it to the mortuary before the reporters arrived.

senses.definition: 形容一個人極之#老實#可靠 (to be completely honest, would not even think of doing anything dishonest; literally: to carry faeces and not steal anything to eat)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢平時擔屎都唔偷食，一定唔會係佢偷咗你啲嘢。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ping4 si4 daam1 si2 dou1 m4 tau1 sik6, jat1 ding6 m4 wui5 hai6 keoi5 tau1 zo2 nei5 di1 je5.
examples.translation: He is completely trustworthy, he must not be the one who stole your things.

senses.definition: 小心去分辨邊啲係好人，信得過，邊啲唔係，從而決定同咩人#交往 (to see clearly whether others are good or bad people; to work out whether one can trust someone or not; to decide whether someone is a good person or not; literally: to know someone with one's eyes)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 做人一定要帶眼識人，如果唔係好易俾人呃。
examples.jyutping: zou6 jan4 jat1 ding6 jiu3 daai3 ngaan5 sik1 jan4, jyu4 gwo2 m4 hai6 hou2 ji6 bei2 jan4 aak1.
examples.translation: You need to learn how to determine whether somebody is trustworthy, otherwise you will likely be deceived.

senses.definition: 激烈嘅性交 (intense sexual intercourse)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 嚴厲嘅批評 (harsh criticism)
發生咗一件非常唔好嘅事 (something bad or disastrous has happened ; a big trouble ; to be in an awful situation ; literally : big wok)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 今次佢大鑊喇，欠咗大耳窿幾十萬。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 keoi5 daai6 wok6 laa3, him3 zo2 daai6 ji5 lung1 gei2 sap6 maan6.
examples.translation: He's really in big trouble now - he owes a few hundred dollars to loan sharks.

senses.definition: 地球表面依#緯 度劃分嘅氣候區 (climatic zone)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #寒帶
examples.jyutping: hon4 daai3
examples.translation: frigid zone

senses.definition: #地區、區域 (region; area)

examples.text: 林帶
examples.jyutping: lam4 daai3
examples.translation: forest belt

senses.definition: 一種婦科症狀 (a gynecological symptom)

examples.text: 白帶
examples.jyutping: baak6 daai2
examples.translation: leucorrhea; whites; leukorrhea

senses.definition: 將啲嘢擺埋一齊，數量好多 (to pile up; to accumulate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 去咗旅行一排，信箱堆積咗好多信。
examples.jyutping: heoi3 zo2 leoi5 hang4 jat1 paai4, seon3 soeng1 deoi1 zik1 zo2 hou2 do1 seon3.
examples.translation: After vacationing for a while, the mailbox has accumulated a pile of letters.

senses.definition: 乜嘢嘅方法先至好 ("What is to be done?" Often asked when in trouble)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我唔見咗個電話呀，點算呀？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 gin3 zo2 go3 din6 waa2 aa3, dim2 syun3 aa3?
examples.translation: I have lost my phone. What should I do now?

senses.definition: 特別嘅性質（量詞：個） (characteristic; unique property; specialty)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 橡膠嘅特性係唔導電。
examples.jyutping: zoeng6 gaau1 ge3 dak6 sing3 hai6 m4 dou6 din6.
examples.translation: A unique property of rubber is its capacity for electrical insulation.

senses.definition: 「指路明燈」嘅反諷；形容一個人有好差嘅預測推算能力，應驗嘅事情往往係預測嘅相反，所以俾人當做反操作指標／逆參考點。 (a sarcastic term of "beacon light": a person that is so bad at making predictions and thus that person becomes a counter reference; to offer predictions for something but the opposite ends up being true; literally: the god of light)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 蕭生真係燈神嚟㗎，十年嚟冇一次估中。
examples.jyutping: siu1 saang1 zan1 hai6 dang1 san4 lai4 gaa3, sap6 nin4 lei4 mou5 jat1 ci3 gu2 zung3.
examples.translation: Mr. Siu is such a master in wrongly predicting things that he has never been right in last 10 years.

senses.definition: 神話故事中嘅精靈，居住係神燈入面，會實現人嘅願望。 (genie)

examples.text: 我都想要阿拉丁隻燈神嚟實現我嘅願望。
examples.jyutping: ngo2 dou1 soeng2 jiu3 aa3 laai1 ding1 zek3 dang1 san4 lei4 sat6 jin6 ngo5 ge3 jyun6 mong6
examples.translation: I want Aladdin's genie to grant my wishes too.

senses.definition: 喺#大學 接受緊#專上教育（多數係指#學士 課程）嘅#學生；有時候「#大專生」都會被統稱為「大學生」（量詞：個） (university student; undergraduate; sometimes including other types of tertiary students)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 身為大學生一定要做齊大學五件事。
examples.jyutping: san1 wai4 daai6 hok6 saang1 jat1 ding6 jiu3 zou6 cai4 daai6 hok6 ng5 gin6 si6.
examples.translation: There are five things you must do as a university student.

senses.definition: 喺大學接受過專上教育嘅人；大學畢業生 (university graduate; person who has studied in a university)
將你嘅嘢畀人，佢又將佢嘅嘢畀你，作為交換 (to exchange; to change; to swap)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我家姐話鍾意我隻錶，所以我同佢掉換。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gaa1 ze1 waa6 zung1 ji3 ngo5 zek3 biu1, so2 ji3 ngo5 tung4 keoi5 diu6 wun6.
examples.translation: My sister said she liked my watch, so she swapped it for my one.

senses.definition: 擲#骰仔 (to throw dice)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 因為賭局中擲骰嘅人通常係#莊家，引伸為#揸弗；#話事；指揮 (to be the boss; to be in command, to be in charge ; to call the shots)

examples.text: 佢爸爸唔喺度嘅時候，家族嘅生意就由佢打骰。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 baa4 baa1 m4 hai2 dou6 ge3 si4 hau6, gaa1 zuk6 ge3 saang1 ji3 zau6 jau4 keoi5 daa2 sik1.
examples.translation: He took charge of the family business when his father was away.

senses.definition: #細路；#小朋友（量詞：個） (kid; small child; literally: bean nail)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你個豆釘吖！咁百厭都有嘅？
examples.jyutping: nei5 go3 dau6 deng1 aa1! gam3 baak3 jim3 dou1 jau5 ge2?
examples.translation: You kid! How naughty you are!

senses.definition: 表示強烈嘅唔願意 (used to indicate a strong unwillingness, literally "to be beaten to death")
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我打死都唔返去㗎喇！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 daa2 sei2 dou1 m4 faan1 heoi3 gaa3 laa3!
examples.translation: I am not going back no matter what.

senses.definition: 件事發展到最後有所轉折 (in the end; ultimately; indicating some twist of the story in the result)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我哋本來諗住去日本嘅，點知到頭來我哋去咗韓國。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 bun2 loi4 nam2 zyu6 heoi3 jat6 bun2 ge3, dim2 zi1 dou3 tau4 loi4 ngo5 dei6 heoi3 zo2 hon4 gwok3
examples.translation: We were originally thinking about going to Japan, but in the end we went to Korea.

senses.definition: 得到一啲想要、而且係需要努力先可以得到嘅嘢 (to achieve what one wants; to get what one is after; to succeed; to gratify one's heart's desire ;  literally: to get rice)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 終於約到個女仔出街喇，今次仲唔得米？
examples.jyutping: zung1 jyu1 joek3 dou2 go3 neoi5 zai2 ceot1 gaai1 laa3, gam1 ci3 zung6 m4 dak1 mai5?
examples.translation: I finally managed to ask the girl out on a date, hurray!

senses.definition: 桌球術語，打入咗白波 (to pot the cue ball)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 撻死輸四度
examples.jyutping: daat3 sei2 syu1 sei3 dou6
examples.translation: pot the cue ball and opponent scores 4

senses.definition: 得到擁有權 (to come into one's possession; to obtain)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 啲錢一到手， 佢就攞晒去賭
examples.jyutping: di1 cin2 jat1 dou3 sau2, keoi5 zau6 lo2 saai3 heoi3 dou2
examples.translation: As soon as he got the money, he took it all to gamble.

senses.definition: 多次口頭提醒 (to urge again and again; to warn; to exhort)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 母親再三叮囑我哋要俾心機讀書。
examples.jyutping: mou5 can1 zoi3 saam1 ding1 zuk1 ngo5 dei6 jiu3 bei2 sam1 gei1 duk6 syu1.
examples.translation: Mother urges us again and again to study hard.

senses.definition: 提唔起勇氣 (afraid; faint-hearted; timid)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 一種股市現象；源於香港藝人鄭少秋喺1992年電視劇《大時代》中飾演主角丁蟹，劇集播映期間，適逢香港股市大跌；之後每逢鄭氏主演嘅電視節目播映，香港股市都近乎會下跌 (Ting Hai effect; Adam Cheng effect)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 因為驚或者困難而放棄，唔再做一樣嘢 (to back out; to retreat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 只係比賽咗一半啫，你咁快打退堂鼓認輸嗱？
examples.jyutping: zi2 hai6 bei2 coi3 zo2 jat1 bun3 ze1, nei5 gam3 faai3 daa2 teoi3 tong4 gu2 jing6 syu1 laa4?
examples.translation: It's just half-time and you are already giving up?

senses.definition: 用棍打蛇打唔中，反而俾條蛇纏咗上碌棍到；比喻一方露出弱點，另一方乘機反咬一啖、攞到著數；後來引申指第一步策略得手，準備第二步乘勝追擊 (to exploit a situation to one's advantage; to seize the opportunity and go one step further in order to achieve an even better result; literally 'to hit a snake (and miss), and it crawls up along the stick')
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你咁答死梗啦，人地一定打蛇隨棍上。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam2 daap3 sei2 gang2 laa1, jan4 dei6 jat1 ding6 daa2 se4 ceoi4 gwan3 soeng5.
examples.translation: If you give this as your answer, you're in trouble — they'll surely use it against you.

senses.definition: #二十四節氣 之一，喺公曆每年1月19至21日之間，代表進入嚴冬 (the 24th solar term, literally "great cold")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
獲得或取得某啲嘢 (to get; to gain; to obtain; to have)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 得獎者將會得到一張來回三藩市嘅機票。
examples.jyutping: dak1 zoeng2 ze2 zoeng1 wui5 dak1 dou2 jat1 zoeng1 loi4 wui4 saam1 faan4 si5 ge3 gei1 piu3.
examples.translation: The winner will get a return ticket to San Francisco.

senses.definition: 變得穩定，唔再變嚟變去；引申指喺一個地方定居唔再搬嚟搬去 (to settle down; to become stable)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢幾年周圍去，而家打算返香港定落嚟。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gei2 nin4 zau1 wai4 heoi3, ji4 gaa1 daa2 syun3 faan1 hoeng1 gong2 ding6 lok6 lai4.
examples.translation: I've been going around these few years. Now I'm planning to go back to Hong Kong and settle down.

senses.definition: 疏忽；唔夠小心 (negligent; careless)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: #粗心大意
examples.jyutping: cou1 sam1 daai6 ji3
examples.translation: careless

senses.definition: 電路之中電力嘅源頭 (power source)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #壞 咗；無法再操作 (to be out of order; to break down)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢架車打咗柴，所以佢諗住買過部新嘅。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gaa3 ce1 daa2 zo2 caai4, so2 ji5 keoi5 nam2 zyu6 maai5 gwo3 bou6 san1 ge3.
examples.translation: His car broke down, so he's thinking to buy a new one.

senses.definition: #警察（犯咗嚴重錯誤而）被降職，又叫做#飛柴；員佐級職級嘅章叫做「#柴」，數量隨住職級遞增，降職就會冇咗啲柴 ((of police officers) to be demoted)
#重量 單位；通常指一千#公斤 (ton; tonne; metric ton)
senses.label: 量詞

senses.definition: 移動嘅軌跡成圓形 (to move in a circle, especially in the air; to circle)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 響紙上面畫個圓圈 (to draw a circle)

examples.text: 喺適當嘅答案上打圈。
examples.jyutping: hai2 sik1 dong3 ge3 daap3 on3 soeng6 daa2 hyun1.
examples.translation: Circle the correct answer.

senses.definition: 形容情侶、夫妻關係極好，唔會輕易離異 (to describe a strong bond between couples;  to describe the love between a couple is steadfast and unbreakable ; literally: the wind can't tear a couple apart)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我同我老婆打風打唔甩，點會為少少錢離婚。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 tung4 ngo5 lou5 po4 daa2 fung1 daa2 m4 lat1, dim2 wui5 wai6 siu2 siu2 cin2 lei4 fan1.
examples.translation: Nothing can tear me and my wife apart. Why would we divorce because of a small sum of money?

senses.definition: 用帶有#偏見或歧視嘅眼光看待人。 (a metaphor for biased perspective; to discriminate or have prejudice against someone ; literally: wear a pair of tinted glasses)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 成晚唔瞓覺去諗問題 (to stay awake thinking about a problem; literally: to stand the bed-boards upright)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你今晚戙起牀板反省下。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam1 maan5 dung6 hei2 cong4 baan2 faan2 sing2 haa5.
examples.translation: You should stay up tonight and reflect on your mistakes.

senses.definition: #打麻雀 (to play mahjong)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 玩啤牌遊戲 (to play card games, especially those played with playing cards (aka poker cards))
歇後語，白費工夫 (literally meaning "using sand to try and fill up the sea", which means someone is doing something that is useless or with no effort-worth.)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: #老婆（或女伴）同其他男人發生感情關係或性關係 (to have a wife or girlfriend who is ran after by or has sexual relations with another man; a man is cuckolded or two-timed; literally: to wear a green hat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你成日出差去外國，戴咗綠帽都唔知道。
examples.jyutping: nei5 seng4 jat6 ceot1 caai1 heoi3 ngoi6 gwok3, daai3 zo2 luk6 mou2 dou1 m4 zi1 dou3.
examples.translation: You are always working somewhere else. You wouldn't even know if you were cuckolded.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA

senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我明明就唔係咁嘅意思，你唔好係到打稻草人喎！
examples.translation: That’s not what I meant. Don’t try to construct a strawman argument!

senses.definition: 一 (single; one)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.text: 單層巴士
examples.jyutping: daan1 cang4 baa1 si2
examples.translation: single-decker bus

senses.definition: 唔能夠畀2整除嘅整數 ((maths.) odd)

examples.text: #單數
examples.jyutping: daan1 sou3
examples.translation: odd number

senses.definition: 被#燈神 吹捧之後變成失敗 (to happen in the opposite to "the god of light" prediction, who is famous of making bad predictions)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢重金買紅隊贏，然後紅隊就俾佢燈死咗。

senses.definition: 一種小朋友玩嘅遊戲；喺一堆物件或者人當中隨機開始，然後逐隻字講「點指兵兵，點着誰人做大兵」（後半句「點指賊賊，點着誰人做大賊」比較少講），逐隻嘢用手指指住，指到最後嗰個就代表揀中咗佢 ("who's the soldier/cop", a children's game of counting out like "eeny, meeny, miny, moe")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 引申指喺幾樣嘢入面隨機揀一個 (figuratively, to choose or count out randomly)

examples.text: 個餐牌好多選擇唔知食咩好，點指兵兵，就決定係你啦！

senses.definition: 多過一種語言，通常指三種語言或以上 (multilingual)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.text: 多語環境
examples.jyutping: do1 jyu5 waan4 ging2
examples.translation: multilingual environment

senses.definition: 將繩繞埋一齊而成嘅結構 (to tie a knot)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 條鞋帶打咗死結，解唔開添。
examples.translation: This shoelace was tied into a dead knot and I cannot undo it.

senses.definition: 遊戲、動漫術語，指角色最強嘅 #絕招 (ultimate move; the most powerful attack)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 開大絕
examples.translation: cast ultimate

senses.definition: 形容好容易；多數帶輕視嘅態度 (as easy as pie ; a piece of cake ; literally : take it as eating lettuce)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: #誓願當食生菜
examples.jyutping: sai3 jyun6 dong3 sik6 saang1 coi3
examples.translation: to make easy promises without intention to keep them; literally: to swear an oath as if eating lettuce

senses.definition: 品質差劣，容易損壞 (easily damaged or broken; fragile; inferior; of low quality; poor in quality)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 部收音機好豆泥，只係買咗三日就壞咗喇。
examples.jyutping: bou6 sau1 jam1 gei1 hou2 dau6 nai4, zi2 hai6 maai5 zo2 saam1 jat6 zau6 waai6 zo2 laa3.
examples.translation: The quality of this radio is very poor. It broke three days after I bought it.

senses.definition: 比喻以壓倒性嘅力量逼使其他人#服從 (to compel someone to obey with overwhelming force ; to be overpowered by an overwhelming force ; literally: a large rock crushing a crab to death)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我唔應承就要「被辭職」，咁你即係大石砸死蟹啫。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 jing1 sing4 zau6 jiu3 bei6 ci4 zik1, gam2 nei5 ze1 hai6 daai6 sek6 zaak3 sei2 haai5 ze1.
examples.translation: You'll "resign" me unless I say yes? You're trying to  "crush a crab with a boulder".

senses.definition: 借錢 (to ask for a loan; to borrow a small amount of money ; literally: measure the water)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 大佬我呢排手頭有啲緊，可唔可以幫幫手度水呀？
examples.jyutping: daai6 lou2 ngo5 ni1 paai4 sau2 tau4 jau5 di1 gan2, ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 bong1 bong1 sau2 dok6 seoi2 aa3?
examples.translation: Hey man, I am going through some lean times, can you help me out with some small loans?

senses.definition: 形容一個人擁有好多錢或者資產 (rich; having a lot of money)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢老公好疊水。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 lou5 gung1 hou2 daap6 seoi2.
examples.translation: Her husband is very rich.

phonetic.original: diu3 geng2 dou1 jiu3 tau2 haa5 hei3
jyutping: diu3 geng2 dou1 jiu3 tau2 haa5 hei3

senses.definition: 工作再繁忙都需要休息；強調休息嘅重要性 (to snatch a bit of leisure from a busy life; literally: to take a breath even if one is hanging oneself)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你今日都做咗好多嘢喇。不如聽日再做啦，吊頸都要抖下氣呀。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam1 jat6 dou1 zou6 zo2 hou2 do1 je5 laa3. bat1 jyu4 ting1 jat6 zoi3 zou6 laa1, diu3 geng2 dou1 jiu3 tau2 haa5 hei3 aa3.
examples.translation: You've worked so hard today. Why not take a break? Even superheroes need to rest.

keywords: diu3 geng2 dou1 jiu3 tau2 haa5 hei3
diu geng dou jiu tau haa hei

senses.definition: 將煲掟爛；引申指#散、#分手、結束兩人嘅情侶關係 (to break up (to end a romantic relationship); literally, to break a pot)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: #掟煲費
examples.jyutping: deng3 bou1 fai3
examples.translation: break-up compensation

senses.definition: 用#電力 做能源，發出光線#照明 嘅裝置，外形通常都會做到近似球體（量詞：個／盞） (light bulb)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我唔夠高換電燈膽，有冇人可以幫下我？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 gau3 gou1 wun6 din6 dang1 daam2, jau5 mou5 jan4 ho2 ji5 bong1 haa5 ngo5?
examples.translation: Can anyone help me change the light bulb? I'm not tall enough.

senses.definition: 夾喺情侶中間、唔識迴避、阻住對情侶談情説愛嘅人（量詞：個）（語源：由於以前電燈膽嘅玻璃入面係真空嘅，所以「電燈膽」有句歇後語「#唔通氣」；而家淨係用前半句去表達「唔通氣嘅人」） (an unwanted third person who accompanies a pair of lovers; the third wheel)

examples.text: 佢哋兩個咁煙韌，我都唔好意思做電燈膽嘞。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 loeng5 go3 gam3 jin1 ngan6, ngo5 dou1 m4 hou2 ji3 si1 zou6 din6 dang1 daam2 laak3.
examples.translation: The two of them are so intimate with each other, it doesn't feel right for me to be the third wheel.

senses.definition: 幫人買嘢時虛報價錢，從中賺取差額獲利 (to make a secret and ill-gotten profit when buying something on behalf of others; to cheat someone when buying something on their behalf)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 陳師奶成日買餸打斧頭，儲儲埋埋都唔少錢㗎。
examples.jyutping: can4 si1 naai1 sing4 jat6 maai5 sung3 daa2 fu2 tau4, cou5 cou5 maai4 maai4 dou1 m4 siu2 cin2 gaa3.
examples.translation: Mrs Chan always cheats while buying groceries, she must have saved a lot of money.

senses.definition: 受人#擦鞋，#奉承 (to be flattered;  to lay it on thick ; to exaggerate or overstate praise ; literally: to wear a top hat)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢好鍾意戴高帽，你讚吓佢，佢一定開心嘅。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hou2 zung1 ji3 daai3 gou1 mou2, nei5 zaan3 haa5 keoi5, keoi5 jat1 ding6 hoi1 sam1 ge3.
examples.translation: He loves to be flattered. He will be happy if you give him a few praises.

senses.definition: 自己一個人，冇人幫手，形容獨自進行或者對抗。 (single-handedly; all alone)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢單槍匹馬對住對面成條街嘅敵人，情況好危急。
examples.translation: He's facing enemies from the whole opposite street all by himself, the situation is very critical.

senses.definition: 喺人哋身上偷取財物 (to pick sby's pocket; to steal small objects, esp. money, from sby's pockets or bag; to pick-pocket  ; literally: beat the wallet)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我喺個好逼嘅商場入便俾人打荷包。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hai2 go3 hou2 bik1 ge3 soeng1 coeng4 jap6 bin6 bei2 jan4 daa2 ho4 baau1.
examples.translation: I had my pocket picked in a crowded shopping mall.

senses.definition: 形容手忙腳亂，控制唔到場面 (in a hectic and embarrassing situation ; a chaotic situation that one can hardly handle ; literally: spill a basket of crabs)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我第一日教書，遇到班曳學生，搞到我倒瀉籮蟹。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dai6 jat1 jat6 gaau3 syu1, jyu6 dou2 baan1 jai1 hok6 saang1, gaau2 dou3 ngo5 dou2 se2 lo4 haai5.
examples.translation: The first day as a teacher, I encountered some really naughty students. The situation was hectic and embarrassing.

senses.definition: 同外力抗衡，以維持現狀 (to withstand an external force)

examples.jyutping: ding2 zyu6 aa3! zau6 faai3 dou3 ji1 jyun2 laa3.

examples.jyutping: nei5 gam1 jat6 ding2 aa3 fan1 go3 wai2 laa1, keoi5 beng6 zo2.

examples.jyutping: can4 saang1 ding2 zo2 gaan1 pou3 lai4 zou6.

senses.definition: 廣東小食，用#麪粉、#雞蛋 同#豬油 搓成一條條，落油鑊炸，炸到金黃色；可以蘸麥芽糖食 (a Cantonese snack made with flour, eggs and lard; the ingredients are mixed and twisted into strips and fried until it has a golden colour. It can be dipped into malt syrup when served.)

examples.jyutping: nei5 tiu4 daan6 saan2 jau6 hoeng2 syu3 zo2 tau4 zo2 sai3, daan6 hoi1 laa1!

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
預先購買一段時間嘅報紙、雜誌之類嘅常刊刊物，其後定期收到最新刊物 (to subscribe to some kind of publication (e.g. newspapers, magazines, etc.))

senses.definition: #細佬 嘅#老婆 (wife of one's younger brother; sister-in-law)

senses.definition: 一種賭博落注方式，指唔放本金落注，只靠口頭承諾同信用，嬴咗就無本生利，輸咗先至交出本金填數，類似「#賭白頭片」 (to place the bet verbally when gambling, means to place no physical bet, only by verbal promise and credit, when one wins then win without cost, only need to pay principal if lost. Literally: to poke finger)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢班富豪不時都會落賭場玩，個個落注都係篤手指 ，唔使出一分一毫可以玩足成日， 全部講個「 信」 字。
examples.translation: This band of billionaires occasionally come down to play in casino, they all bet by verbal only, and can play the whole day without taking a cent for bet, all they need to pay is their integrity.

senses.definition: 股場術語，指頻密咁無本短炒。因香港買股實行 T+2制度，即成交後兩日才交收，若在交收前沽貨離場，只需支付兩日利息及交易費用，到沽貨後交收日結算差價，呢個方法只能經細股票行買賣，因為毋須存入本金。 (Stock market jargon, means to use the T+2 policy of Hong Kong stock market to do short term speculations with very low cost. The way is to place buying order and then sell it within 2 days before the clearance time, this can capture the margin of price difference without paying any principle. This only works in small scale stockbrokers as they do not require deposit of principal.)
指自我監測血糖嘅程序，要用針筒拮入手指頭 (self-measurement of blood glucose level, need to prick finger to take blood sample. Literally: to prick finger)

examples.text: 聽到「篤手指」好多人都會驚，但因為攞一滴血就可以監察血糖水平，糖尿病人都唯有硬住頭皮去做。
examples.translation: When they hear about pricking their fingers, many are afraid, but by just taking a small blood sample they can monitor their glucose levels, so diabetic patients have no choice but to do it.

senses.definition: 指全靠一人或一物支撐全局。源出#天九 術語：至尊(六配三)係最大牌組，一出就有錢收，不過首先要有出牌權，即係做莊或之前一槓要嬴咗先。如果你係閒家，有幅至尊，其餘全部爛牌，就要靠隻天牌(12點)嬴之前嗰一槓，然後先有得出至尊去收錢。 (means the whole game/situation saved by a single man or thing. Originated from Tien Gow game: Supreme is the biggest combo (3 and 6) to win the cash immediately, but if player is not banker and all the tiles are in low rank, the player need a Sky tile(biggest in single trick) to win a trick first, to get the chance to play out Supreme to win the whole game. Literally : A Sky suit saves the Supreme)

senses.definition: 以往流傳於東亞建築行業嘅一種活人祭獻方式。以前嘅人相信響一處地方動土興建會破壞風水同觸怒冤魂，令建造期間發生意外，於是有人將小孩生葬響樁柱之下用作祭品鎮邪。以前嘅父母亦會以此恐嚇百厭嘅細路。 (to bury a person alive under a pile, a living human sacrifice in previous East Asia's construction industry; literally: to sink a living human pile. People used to believe that a construction would affect the Feng Shui and disturb the ghosts in a place, that would cause accidents during construction. To avoid so, some would bury one or more living children under piles as an offering. This scary term was then used to threaten naughty children.)

senses.definition: 遇到困境時依然唔放棄，堅持落去 (to stick to one's course of action (even when one encounters great difficulties); to remain steadfast)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 遇到難關嗰陣都要頂硬上㗎啦。唔係點攞冠軍啊？

examples.translation: When the going gets tough, you must push through. How else are you to become a champion?

senses.definition: 得到某件物品，但係用唔到、用唔着 (to obtain/acquire something that is not useful)

senses.definition: 話俾對方聽自己嘅身份或者附屬嘅組織，通常係比較重要同突出嘅，去獲得某種利益 (to reveal one's prominent identity or affiliation with an organisation in order to gain interests)

senses.definition: 香港嘅一種平民化食肆，通常賣中菜同埋港式西餐；多數都係喺室外擺放枱凳，只會有帆布帳篷遮風擋雨；亦都會指由傳統大排檔轉型嘅公共屋邨#冬菇亭，同埋#街市 嘅室內#熟食市場（量詞：個／檔） (dai pai dong, a kind of food vendor in Hong Kong, typically operating as open-air food stalls, and specializing in Chinese cuisine and Hong Kong-style western cuisine)

examples.text: 通常話大排檔炒嘅餸特別夠鑊氣，其實好可能係因為坐得近個爐，香味撲鼻。
examples.jyutping: tung1 soeng4 waa6 daai6 paai4 dong3 caau2 ge3 sung3 dak6 bit6 gau3 wok6 hei3, kei4 sat6 hou2 ho2 nang4 hai6 jan1 wai6 co5 dak1 kan5 go3 lou4, hoeng1 mei6 pok3 bei6.

examples.text: 一直增加社會福利解決唔到問題，根本只會多隻香爐多隻鬼，不如諗下助人自助仲好。

examples.text: 你隻大食懶，幾時先肯揾工？
examples.jyutping: nei5 zek3 daai6 sik6 laan5, gei2 si4 sin1 hang2 wan2 gung1.
examples.translation: You lazybones, when will you start to apply for jobs?

senses.definition: 指人或者事物好高超或者好犀利，完全贏晒 (to dominate, to own/pwn, to win completely, often with superior skills or quality)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 屌打全場
examples.jyutping: diu2 daa2 cyun4 coeng4
examples.translation: to dominate everyone at the scene, to be superb

senses.definition: 製作模具畀#石屎 成形 (to erect formwork for concrete molding)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 吓，仲改design？樓下釘曬板喇喎！
examples.jyutping: haa2, zung6 goi2 di6 saai2? lau4 haa6 deng1 saai3 baan2 laa3 wo3.
examples.translation: What, they changed the design? The formworks are already up!

senses.definition: 比喻透過人際關係建立事前聯繫、或得到通過關口嘅事先准許，令事件能夠更易解決 (to build up a connection through interpersonal relationship, or to find out a shortcut to skip through gateways, in order to make it easier to accomplish the target; lit. to build a road)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 搭晒路
examples.jyutping: daap3 saai3 lou6
examples.translation: the connections has all been built up beforehand

senses.definition: #演習 (to have a drill; to practice; to demonstrate. The short form of "demonstrate")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋而家會dem一次比賽個流程先。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 ji4 gaa1 wui5 dem1 jat1 ci3 bei2 coi3 go3 lau4 cing4 sin1.
examples.translation: Let's go through a practice run of the competition procedure first.

senses.definition: 表演；演示；示威 (to show; to protest; to demonstrate)

examples.text: dem beat
examples.jyutping: dem1 bit1
examples.translation: to demonstrate a beat/slogan

senses.definition: 污糟咗嘅#面 (a dirty face; literally: big coloured face)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 化妝化到成個大花面咁，好樣衰呀！
examples.jyutping: faa3 zong1 faa3 dou3 seng4 go3 daai6 faa1 min2 gam2, hou2 joeng2 seoi1 aa3!
examples.translation: Your makeup makes your face look very messy.

senses.definition: #粵劇 嘅一種#行當（角色種類），指性格突出嘅男性角色，藉搽喺面上嘅面譜同圖案嚟表現 (a treacherous male, a role in Cantonese opera)
用手或者容器接住 (to hold or carry something in both hands or a container temporarily)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 揾手兜住啲水
examples.jyutping: wan2 sau2 dau1 zyu6 di1 seoi2
examples.translation: to cup one's hands to hold water

senses.definition: 行一條長啲或冇咁直接嘅路線 (to take a longer or less direct route)

examples.text: #兜路
examples.jyutping: dau1 lou6
examples.translation: to take a less direct route

senses.definition: 將唔好嘅情況扭轉變返好；尤其指講錯嘢之後，揾方法修補或自圓其説 (to turn around a bad situation; especially, to make amends for a wrong or impolite remark)

examples.text: 頭先講錯嘢，好彩兜得返啫。
examples.jyutping: tau4 sin1 gong2 co3 je5, hou2 coi2 dau1 dak1 faan1 ze1.
examples.translation: I said something wrong, but luckily I managed to turn around the bad situation and not make a fool of myself.

senses.definition: 用車載人去第二個地方 (to give someone a ride)

examples.text: 你可唔可以兜一兜我去灣仔啊？
examples.jyutping: nei5 ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 dau1 jat1 dau1 ngo5 heoi3 waan1 zai2 aa3?
examples.translation: Can you give me a quick ride to Wan Chai?

senses.definition: 喺鑊入面#炒 嘢 (to stir-fry something)

examples.text: 呢啲蝦，兜兩兜就熟㗎嘞。
examples.jyutping: nei1 di1 haa1, dau1 loeng5 dau1 zau6 suk6 gaa3 laak3.
examples.translation: These shrimps should be well-cooked if you give them a quick stir in the wok.

senses.definition: #對準 (to direct towards)

examples.text: 兜心口打佢一拳
examples.jyutping: dau1 sam1 hau2 daa2 keoi5 jat1 kyun4
examples.translation: punch someone in the chest

senses.definition: 生#細路 (to give birth to a child)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你都唔諗吓老母扽你出嚟幾辛苦！
examples.jyutping: nei5 dou1 m4 nam2 haa2 lou5 mou2 dan3 nei5 ceot1 lai4 gei2 san1 fu2!
examples.translation: Don't you realize how difficult it was for your mother to bringing you into this world?

senses.definition: 以某種態度同人相處或者面對某件事 (to treat; to do something to others; to show something to others)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你要好好噉對待你嘅父母。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jiu3 hou2 hou2 gam2 deoi3 doi6 nei5 ge3 fu6 mou5.
examples.translation: You should treat your parents well.

senses.definition: #派遣，#吩咐 某人去負責某個#崗位 (send; assign; dispatch (like somebody on an errand))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: #老闆 打發咗佢去做#代表。
examples.jyutping: lou5 baan2 daa2 faat3 zo2 keoi5 heoi3 zou6 doi6 biu2.
examples.translation: The boss assigned him to represent the company in a rather offhand manner.

senses.definition: #敷衍 咁趕走一個人，用啲方法令對方離場 (send away; get ride of)

examples.text: 佢年紀太大，幫唔到手嚹，俾啲#退休金 打發佢走啦。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 nin4 gei2 taai3 daai6, bong1 m4 dou2 sau2 laa3, bei2 di1 teoi3 jau1 gam1 daa2 faat3 keoi5 zau2 laa1.
examples.translation: He is too old and not so helpful now. Let's give him some pension and lay him off.

senses.definition: #消耗，#消磨，通常形容#時間 (fritter; while away; kill (time))

examples.text: #老人家 要學識點樣打發時間先至唔會覺得#悶。
examples.jyutping: lou5 jan4 gaa1 jiu3 hok6 sik1 dim2 joeng2 daa2 faat3 si4 gaan3 sin1 zi3 m4 wui5 gok3 dak1 mun6.
examples.translation: To get rid of boredom, old people need to learn how to kill time by themselves.

senses.definition: 冇#女人緣 嘅男人 (man unpopular with women; permavirgin; literally: poisonous man)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢度好多人都係毒男。
examples.jyutping: ni1 dou6 hou2 do1 jan4 dou1 hai6 duk6 naam4
examples.translation: Many people here are socially awkward men.

senses.definition: 逐個去數 (to count one by one)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: #點數
examples.jyutping: dim2 sou3
examples.translation: to count the total

senses.definition: 誤導人或者呃人；亦叫做「#老點」 (to mislead or deceive; see also #老點 lou5 dim2)

examples.text: 呢間舖都冇我要嗰件，你點我呀？
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 pou3 dou1 mou5 ngo5 jiu3 go2 gin6, nei5 dim2 ngo5 aa4?
examples.translation: This store doesn't have the piece I want. Are you trolling me?

senses.definition: #命令 人哋做嘢；好唔客氣咁叫人做嘢 (to command someone (to do something), often in a disrespectful manner)

examples.text: 我老細好鍾意點人做嘢，自己就玩接龍。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 lou5 sai3 hou2 zung1 ji3 dim2 jan4 zou6 je5, zi6 gei2 zau6 waan2 zip3 lung4.
examples.translation: My boss likes to make people work, but he just plays solitaire himself.

senses.definition: 從多個選項之中揀出 (to pick from various choices)

examples.text: #點歌
examples.jyutping: dim2 go1
examples.translation: to request a song

senses.definition: 點燃；令到一樣嘢著火 (to light something on fire)

examples.text: #點火
examples.jyutping: dim2 fo2
examples.translation: to light a fire

senses.definition: 將物件稍為掂一掂某種液體、醬汁或者粉末；#蘸 (to dip)

examples.text: 點啲豉油吖！
examples.jyutping: dim2 di1 si6 jau4 aa1!
examples.translation: Dip it in some soy sauce.

senses.definition: 用作形容詞詞綴，程度更大 ((used after an adjective as a complement) much more)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.text: 佢比佢老公友善得多。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bei2 keoi5 lou5 gung1 jau5 sin6 dak1 do1.
examples.translation: She is much more friendly than her husband.

senses.definition: 幅度好大噉；好大程度噉 (substantially)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 受感染嘅人大幅減少。
examples.translation: The number of people infected has been substantially reduced.

senses.definition: 對正對方去做一啲事 (face to face)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 頭先畀人兜口兜面鬧我。
examples.jyutping: tau4 sin1 bei2 jan4 dau1 hau2 dau1 min6 naau6 ngo5.
examples.translation: Just now, someone scolded me to my face.

senses.definition: 「#多鳩餘」嘅諧音；冇用、嘥氣、冇意義 (meaningless; useless; superfluous; near homophone of and euphemism for #多鳩餘 do1gau1jyu4)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你講嚟都多嚿魚。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gong2 lai4 dou1 do1 gau6 jyu2.
examples.translation: Your words are utterly meaningless.

senses.definition: #豎起、#舉起 或#直立 (to make something upright)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 戙起啲書
examples.jyutping: dung6 hei2 di1 syu1
examples.translation: to stand the books upright

senses.definition: 好似一條直柱噉企喺度 (to stand like a pillar)

examples.text: 你做乜一碌木噉棟喺度？
examples.jyutping: nei5 zou6 mat1 jat1 luk1 muk6 gam2 dung6 hai2 dou6?
examples.translation: Why are you standing here like a wood pillar?

senses.definition: 因為利益衝突或者立場唔同而對立 (hostile; antagonistic)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個國家啱啱搞完革命，國內仲有好多敵對勢力未肅清。
examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 gwok3 gaa1 ngaam1 ngaam1 gaau2 jyun4 gaap3 ming6, gwok3 noi6 zung6 jau5 hou2 do1 dik6 deoi3 sai3 lik6 mei6 suk1 cing1.
examples.translation: The country has just gone through a revolution, and many opposition forces still remain.

senses.definition: 唔會辜負人 (to have a clear conscience toward somebody; not to let somebody down; to have nothing to be ashamed of)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你借完我錢就走佬，你對得住我㗎嗱？
examples.translation: After borrowing my money, you ran away; how could you do this to me?

senses.definition: #狠毒 ；蓄意為其他人造成嚴重傷害 (cruel; vicious)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 毒辣嘅手段
examples.jyutping: duk6 laat6 ge3 sau2 dyun6
examples.translation: vicious means

senses.definition: 向人打暗號畀提示 (give hint to somebody with codes or signs that not regonizable normally, literally to send a message throught telegram.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 上次考試全班冇人合到格，所以今次老師向學生打哂電報，提示佢哋要温邊題。
examples.translation: No one passed the last exam, so this time the teacher provided hints to help students prepare for revision.

senses.definition: #春袋 嘅簡稱（量詞：個） (abbreviation of 「#春袋」(scrotum))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 袋底
examples.jyutping: doi6 dai2
examples.translation: bottom of scrotum

senses.definition: 一種髮型，髮尾喺膊頭上面，頭髮有弧度，形狀似冬菇 (bob style haircut)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 林林剪冬菇頭都一樣俘虜到我嘅心。
examples.jyutping: lam4 lam2 zin2 dung1 gu1 tau4 dou1 jat1 joeng6 fu1 lou5 dou2 ngo5 ge3 sam1.
examples.translation: Even with her bob hairstyle, Lam-lam still captivates my heart.

senses.definition: 畀人打得太少；暗指某個人受嘅教訓唔夠多，唔知道自己嘅做法或者行為有問題（所以更加應該要受啲教訓）。 (Literally, "not beaten up frequently enough"; It means that the person being described has not experienced enough punishments for his/her problematic behavior (and thus deserves more).)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 阿松佢又喺度搞鬼。佢真係打得少！
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 keoi5 jau6 hai2 dou6 gaau2 gwai2. keoi5 zan1 hai6 daa2 dak1 siu2!
examples.translation: A-chung is up to his mischief again; he really needs more discipline!

senses.definition: 人工發出用嚟照明嘅光芒 (lighting; light from an artificial source)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 柔和嘅燈光
examples.jyutping: jau4 wo4 ge3 dang1 gwong1
examples.translation: soft lighting

senses.definition: 短時間內買賣股票，希望可以從中獲利 (to trade shares in short-term)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢啲股票短炒嘅話，隨時輸死你喎。
examples.translation: If you trade these stocks in the short term, you could potentially suffer significant losses.

senses.definition: 講粗口；#爆粗（因為報紙會用魚蝦蟹嘅符號代替粗口，所以用咗魚蝦蟹去借代粗口） (to use bad language; to swear; literally: to stir-fry prawn and dress crab, since signs of fish, prawn and crab were used to replace swear words in newspaper)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 條友成日喺度屌蝦拆蟹，冇嚟斯文。
examples.jyutping: tiu4 jau2 seng4 jat6 hai2 dou6 diu2 haa1 caak3 haai5, mou5 lai4 si1 man4.
examples.translation: That guy always swears and lacks refinement altogether.

senses.definition: 用#釘 嚟固定 (to nail; to pin)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 將張告示釘上塊板度。
examples.jyutping: zoeng1 zoeng1 gou3 si6 deng1 soeng5 faai3 baan2 dou6.
examples.translation: to pin up a notice on the board

senses.definition: 利用針線去固定 (to sew on, usu. a button)

examples.text: 我件恤衫甩咗粒鈕，你可唔可以幫我釘返上去呀？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gin6 seot1 saam1 lat1 zo2 lap1 nau2, nei5 ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 bong1 ngo5 deng1 faan1 soeng5 heoi3 aa3?
examples.translation: A button has come off my shirt, could you sew it on for me?

senses.definition: 將紙固定埋一齊變成書 (to bind)

examples.text: 呢幾本期刊釘埋咗做一冊。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gei2 bun2 kei4 hon1 deng1 maai4 zo2 zou6 jat1 caak3.
examples.translation: These periodicals have been bound into one volume.

senses.definition: 死亡。見#釘蓋。 (to die)

examples.text: 佢舊年心臟病發釘咗。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gau6 nin2 sam1 zong6 beng6 faat3 deng1 zo2.
examples.translation: She died of heart attack last year.

senses.definition: 取消 (cancel; suspend)

examples.text: #釘牌
examples.jyutping: deng1 paai4
examples.translation: to have one's license suspended

senses.definition: 形容一個人懶到好似條蛇咁（量詞：條） (a lazy person; lazybones; literally: big lazy snake)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 喂你條大懶蛇仲唔起身？唔使返工呀？
examples.jyutping: wai3 nei5 tiu4 daai6 laan5 se4 zung6 m4 hei2 san1? m4 sai2 faan1 gung1 aa4?
examples.translation: Hey lazybones, why are you still sleeping? Don't you need to go to work?

senses.definition: 當人係#敵人 噉看待；對人抱有#敵意 (to be hostile to someone; to adopt a hostile attitude towards somebody)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋唔應該敵視有色人種。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 m4 jing1 goi1 dik6 si6 jau5 sik1 jan4 zung2.
examples.translation: We should never discriminate against people of color.

senses.definition: 瞓低嗰陣頭同身向天；仰睡 (to sleep on one's back)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個枕頭唔夠厚，打側瞓托唔住個頭，都係打昂瞓舒服啲。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 zam2 tau4 m4 gau3 hau5, daa2 zak1 fan3 tok3 m4 zyu6 go3 tau4, dou1 hai6 daa2 ngong5 fan3 syu1 fuk6 di1
examples.translation: This pillow isn't thick enough. If I sleep on my side, my head won't be supported, so I think sleeping on my back would be more comfortable.

senses.definition: 雕刻一啲細嘅嘢，例如玉石 (to carve something small)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 用玉石雕琢而成嘅白菜。
examples.jyutping: jung6 juk6 sek6 diu1 doek3 ji4 sing4 ge3 baak6 coi3.
examples.translation: The bok choy sculpture is carved from jade.

senses.definition: 掟#筊杯 向神明問卜，視投擲結果為神明嘅答覆 (to cup and drop moon blocks, a divination tool)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 村民揼杯選出緣首。
examples.jyutping: cyun1 man4 dap6 bui1 syun2 ceot1 jyun4 sau2.
examples.translation: Villagers use cup divination to choose their representatives in the Tai Ping Ching Chiu.

senses.definition: #沽空#證券#產品，覺得產品未來價格會跌 (short position (of financial product); literally: short warehouse)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 性交，用陽具插入對方身體入面，可以係陰道、口、或者係肛門 (to have sexual intercourse, including penetration of the vagina, mouth and anus; the subject is often the one doing the penetration)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我有俾你屌㗎！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jau5 bei2 nei5 diu2 gaa3!
examples.translation: I did let you have sex with me!

senses.definition: #責罵 (to admonish; to scold; to reprimand)

examples.text: #百屌成材
examples.jyutping: baak3 diu2 sing4 coi4
examples.translation: becoming a better person through harsh criticism

senses.definition: #做、#食、#飲、#買 (to do; to consume (food or drink); to buy)

examples.text: 屌文
examples.jyutping: diu2 man2
examples.translation: to work on an essay

senses.definition: #理、#睬 (to pay attention to; to respond to)

examples.text: 唔好屌佢啦。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 diu2 keoi5 laa1.
examples.translation: Stop giving him attention.

senses.definition: 捱凍、抵受寒冷 (to withstand  the cold)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: #抵冷貪瀟湘
examples.translation: to withstand the cold for the sake of beauty

senses.definition: 防寒 (can effectively endure the cold)

examples.text: 呢種衫好抵冷。
examples.jyutping: ni1 zung2 saam1 hou2 dai2 laang5.
examples.translation: This type of clothing is very resistant to cold weather.

senses.definition: 足球術語；指進攻球員帶波單對單面對守門員，無論係球員自己一個人帶波進攻至龍門口，或者響龍門口接應傳球。源自《三國演義》中第六十六回「關雲長單刀赴會」嘅劇情。 (soccer jargon; a football player duel with the opponent's goalkeeper, whether he push forward alone or receive a centering pass from teammate; literally : single sword. This term is extracted from the famous Chinese novel "Romance of Three Kingdoms" ch.66 "Armed With A Sword, Guan Yu Goes To A Feast Alone")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 7號仔壓過4個守衞，單刀一射入網，呢球都算經典喇！
examples.translation: No. 7 surged through four defenders, challenged the goalkeeper, and scored – what an epic goal!

senses.definition: 提供資訊畀蒙在鼓裏嘅人 (to provide somebody with information and understanding usually of one's mistakes or unforeseen problems)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 等我點醒你啦，做人最緊要係守信用。
examples.jyutping: dang2 ngo5 dim2 seng2 nei5 laa1, zou6 jan4 zeoi3 gan2 jiu3 hai6 sau2 seon3 jung6.
examples.translation: Let me give you an important tip: the most important virtue is to keep promises.

senses.definition: 對一啲性格#內向#怕醜，通常係興趣#偏門 並且唔受歡迎嘅人（尤其係男性）嘅貶稱（量詞：個／條） (nerd; otaku; derogatory term for introverts (usually male) who are unpopular and interested in nerdy stuff; literally, poisonous dick)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個毒撚完全唔識同人溝通。
examples.jyutping: go3 duk6 lan2 jyun4 cyun4 m4 sik1 tung4 jan4 kau1 tung1.
examples.translation: That nerd doesn't know how to communicate with others at all.

senses.definition: 對一件事作反應 (to react)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔知公司對今次金融風暴會有啲咩對應？
examples.translation: I wonder how the firm will react to this coming financial crisis.

senses.definition: 一物相對於另一物嘅關係 (to correspond; to relate)

examples.text: 呢款耳機係對應番佢自己廠出嗰啲手機。
examples.translation: This earphone is designed for their own brand of phones.

senses.definition: 已載滿乘客，正式用字為「客滿」。 (fully loaded (in the context of passenger vehicle))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 明明有970X，點解970未到任白樓分站已經頂閘？
examples.translation: There are 970X buses available. Why this 970 bus full before reaching Yam Park Building?

senses.definition: 踢波果陣出術、使詐，引申指響競爭中向對手用詭計、唔老實。#茅 即係狡詐、狡猾。 (playing tricks or cheating during ball game, figuratively means being deceitful to your opponent or being dishonest in any competition. Literally: play deceitful ball)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 政府標書未出你間公司就知道晒合約條款，咁樣打茅波都得㗎咩？
examples.translation: How can your company know all the contract requirements before the government tender is released? Is this kind of deceit even allowed?

senses.definition: 保存資料嘅時候，有系統咁留低同管理嘅紀錄（量詞：份／個） (file; record; archive)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 檔案法
examples.jyutping: dong2 on3 faat3
examples.translation: archive law

senses.definition: 少少；通常放喺形容詞後面用嚟做比較 (a little bit; a bit; a bit more; often added after an adjective in comparisons)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.text: 細啲
examples.jyutping: sai3 di1
examples.translation: smaller

senses.definition: 放響一個動詞或形容詞後面，表示程度增強 (used to express the intensification of the preceding verbs or adjectives)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 死多幾錢重
examples.jyutping: sei2 do1 gei2 cin4 cung5
examples.translation: to fail even worse

senses.definition: 特殊；唔尋常；超乎常態；與眾不同；格外 (special; exceptional; out of the ordinary)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢係一個好特別嘅女仔。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai6 jat1 go3 hou2 dak6 bit6 ge3 neoi5 zai2.
examples.translation: She is a very special girl.

senses.definition: 踩#迫力 將架車嘅車速減慢 (to tap the brake of a vehicle)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 緊張關頭， dup車唔到變咗#畀油。
examples.jyutping: gan2 zoeng1 gwaan1 tau4, dap1 ce1 m4 dou2 bin3 zo2 bei2 jau2.
examples.translation: In that emergency situation, I couldn't slow down my car and accidentally pressed the gas pedal instead.

senses.definition: 一樣嘢最後嘅發展或者收結；通常特指電視劇嘅結局 (ending; finale; usually referring to the last episode of a television series)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #一次生兩次熟，三次大結局
examples.jyutping: jat1 ci3 saang1 loeng5 ci3 suk6, saam1 ci3 daai6 git3 guk6
examples.translation: First time stranger, second time intimate, the third time is the finale.

senses.definition: 打電話 (to phone someone)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你打嚟係唔係有咩事?
examples.jyutping: nei5 daa2 lai4 hai6 m4 hai6 jau5 me1 si6
examples.translation: What's the reason for your call?

senses.definition: 回應人哋嘅提問；意思同「#回答」一樣，而且喺日常生活入面比較常用 (to answer; to reply)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢條問題我唔識答。
examples.jyutping: nei1 tiu4 man6 tai4 ngo5 m4 sik1 daap3.
examples.translation: I don't know how to answer this question.

senses.definition: 做#觀音兵 (to be a gun jam bing #觀音兵, to be subservient to a woman that one finds attractive, and to take orders from her like a soldier, in hopes that she will return the affection; usually, the "soldier" is friendzoned by the woman)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 當兵真係好慘㗎，幾時先肯心息唧？
examples.jyutping: dong1 bing1 zan1 hai6 hou2 caam2 gaa3, gei2 si4 sin1 hang2 sam1 sik1 zek1?
examples.translation: Being a gun jam bing is degrading. When will you give up on her?

senses.definition: 一個好有權力、有錢、有影響力嘅人 (a very powerful person; a rich, influential person.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 睇外表完全睇唔出佢係個大粒佬
examples.translation: He doesn't look like a powerful person at all.

senses.definition: 係英文 darling 嘅譯詞，#情侶 之間互相稱呼，表示親密（量詞：個） (darling)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我個打令呢，真係好有型架唧，你恨唔到㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 go3 daa1 ling2 ne1, zan1 hai6 hou2 jau5 jing4 gaa3 zek1, nei5 han6 m4 dou2 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: My darling is extremely handsome; I'm sorry but you don't have a chance.

senses.definition: 為表現#點解 一詞喺一般交談時嘅發音而用嘅寫法；帶戲謔、扮可愛嘅意味 (an alternative written form used specifically to represent the pronunciation for the word #點解 dim2 gaai2 (why) in casual speech; used as a parody or to sound cute)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.text: 好犀利呀！典解嘅？典解會噉嘅？
examples.jyutping: hou2 sai1 lei6 aa3! din2 gaai2 ge3? din2 gaai2 wui5 gam2 ge3?
examples.translation: That's incredible! How come? Why is that so?

senses.definition: 煮餸嗰時加入#芡汁（#鷹粟粉 溝水），令醬汁變濃、變杰同添上些少光澤 (to thicken the sauce with starch-water mixture)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好啦，碟咕嚕肉都炒到咁上下喇，係時候打返個芡，收返杰個汁喇。
examples.jyutping: hou2 laa1, dip6 gu1 lou1 juk6 dou1 caau2 dou3 gam3 soeng6 haa2 laa3, hai6 si4 hau6 daa2 faan1 go3 hin3, sau1 faan1 git6 go3 zap1 laa3.
examples.translation: Alright, after stir-frying the sweet-sour pork, it's time to add some cornstarch mixture to thicken the sauce.

senses.definition: 又稱關元穴，位於肚臍正下方三寸，中醫角度視為人體元氣匯聚之處，儲藏精血，主生殖 (Kwan Yuen point, an acupuncture point 3 inches below the belly button, from the Chinese medical theory it is the energy reservoir of human body, the pool for blood and sperm, important for reproduction)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 氣聚丹田
examples.translation: to accumulate the chi below your belly button

senses.definition: 形容大肚婆大肚個樣 (describing big stomach of the a pregnant woman)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 老婆，你大肚腍耽就唔好走來走去啦。
examples.translation: Honey, with your pregnancy, you shouldn't walk around so much.

senses.definition: #理由 (reason; basis)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢講嘅嘢幾有道理。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gong2 ge3 je5 gei2 jau5 dou6 lei5
examples.translation: What he said is quite reasonable.

senses.definition: #理論，通常同道德、道義有關 (theory, often related to ethics)

examples.text: 人老咗好鍾意成日講道理，難免有啲長氣。
examples.jyutping: jan4 lou5 zo2 hou2 zung1 ji3 seng4 jat6 gong2 dou6 lei5, naan4 min5 jau5 di1 coeng4 hei3
examples.translation: As people grow old they often love droning on about ethics.

senses.definition: 電影電視拍攝期間，演員以鋼線協助高空動作 (to take a wire-flying scene)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 吊威吔唔係就噉拉起個人咁簡單，演員要識得喺空中平衡。
examples.jyutping: diu3 wai1 jaa2 m4 hai6 zau6 gam2 laai1 hei2 go3 jan4 gam3 gaan2 daan1, jin2 jyun4 jiu3 sik1 dak1 hai2 hung1 zung1 ping4 hang4.
examples.translation: Performing wire-flying scenes is not easy; actors need to know how to maintain balance in the air.

senses.definition: 喺遊戲（通常係#麻雀 ）爭一個人嘅時候，短暫落場等大家可以開局 (to join the game (usually a Mahjong game) temporarily as the forth or last player so that a game can start)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿媽去廁所呀，過嚟幫手戥腳啦。
examples.jyutping: aa3 maa1 heoi3 ci3 so2 aa3, gwo3 lai4 bong1 sau2 dang6 goek3 laa1.
examples.translation: Mum's in the toilet, come and fill her seat for her.

senses.definition: 朋友之間應份嘅助人於難嘅情義 (A sense of honor and selfless devotion, including but not limited to, blood kin and fraternity)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 大家朋友，道義上你應該借錢畀我囉。
examples.translation: As friends, wouldn’t it be honorable for you to lend me some money to help me out?

senses.definition: 表示揣測，同真實情況有少少、輕微分別 (approximately; roughly; about)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 大概準則
examples.jyutping: daai6 koi3 zeon2 zak1

senses.definition: 被#委託 做嘢嘅人再委託另一個人去做 (the person whom you entrust with a duty asks another person to take up the duty)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我搭上搭先買到陳奕迅個演唱會嘅飛。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 daap3 soeng6 daap3 sin1 maai5 dou2 can4 jik6 seon3 go3 jin2 coeng3 wui2 ge3 fei1.
examples.translation: I got the concert ticket for Eason Chan through connections.

senses.definition: 垂直、直立 (to be upright, to stand straight up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 寫#大字 枝筆要戙篤企至好。
examples.jyutping: se2 daai6 zi6 zi1 bat1 jiu3 dung6 duk1 kei5 zi3 hou2.
examples.translation: To practice calligraphy, it's best to hold the writing brush upright.

senses.definition: 鐘入面分針指住；分針指住12通常會講「#搭正」，唔講小時嗰陣先可以講「搭十二」，分針指住6嗰陣會講「#搭半」，指住兩個字中間可以講前啲嗰個數字加「個半字」或者「過半字」 (the minute hand of a clock points to (the number))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 踏二
examples.jyutping: daap6 ji6
examples.translation: 10 minutes past the hour

senses.definition: 指某個做法令到人人都受惠 (for everyone's convenience)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 行多兩步，大家好做。
examples.jyutping: haang4 do1 loeng5 bou6, daai6 gaa1 hou2 zou6.
examples.translation: Be more proactive for the benefit of everybody.

senses.definition: 限時內完成，通常時間有啲急趕 (in time; just in time)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.text: 你今日趕唔趕得切返學啊？
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam1 jat6 gon2 m4 gon2 dak1 cit3 faan1 hok6 aa3?
examples.translation: Did you made it in time to school today?

senses.definition: 立即退避 (to go away; to clear off; literally: to bounce off)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢一聽見話我有傷風，即刻就彈開。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 teng1 gin3 waa6 ngo5 jau5 soeng1 fung1, zik1 haak1 zau6 daan6 hoi1.
examples.translation: He immediately went away as soon as he heard that I caught a cold.

senses.definition: 叫人走開，係一種唔禮貌嘅講法 ("Get lost"; "Go away")

examples.text: 彈開啦，柒頭。
examples.jyutping: daan6 hoi1 laa1, cat6 tau4.
examples.translation: Get lost, dickhead.

senses.definition: 指醫生拖長醫治時間，拖延醫治步驟，以賺取更多診症費和藥費 (means a doctor to prolong the healing period or to delay the healing process, in order to earn more medical consultant fee or medicine money)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 咪鬼幫襯嗰個#黃綠醫生 啦，佢成日揼症㗎。
examples.jyutping: mai5 gwai2 bong1 can3 go2 go3 wong4 luk6 ji1 sang1 laa1, keoi5 seng4 jat6 dam1 zing3 gaa3.
examples.translation: Don't go see that quack doctor; he often prolongs treatments to make more money.

senses.definition: 表示戰況/爭鬥嘅情況非常激烈同凶險 (to present the situation where conflict gets extream; literally to fight a close combat with short weapons)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 兩軍對疊，短兵相接。
examples.translation: The two armies are locked in a dangerous and close battle.

senses.definition: 股市中莊家或大户利用大堆證券户口，同時掛出大量唔執行嘅買賣盤，整到好似交投活躍嘅假象，#股票 系統顯示方式睇落好似建築樓宇嘅棚架。 (market manipulation)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 睇到買賣盤兩邊咁多一樣冧把嘅掛盤就知係搭緊棚啦。
examples.translation: Identical orders on both bid and ask sides indicate someone is manipulating the market.

senses.definition: 依據、按照某啲準則行事；按某個份量去估算 (to work in accordance with, according to (some norms);  to count by a certain unit)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: #斷估
examples.jyutping: dyun3 gu2
examples.translation: by blind guess

senses.definition: 強制、用力、並#擺明 咁去做 (to do forcefully and openly)

examples.text: 斷搶
examples.translation: to scramble openly and forcefully

senses.definition: 相等於「可以定係唔可以」，用嚟請求批准 ("Is it OK/fine?"; "Can I do this?"; ask for permission to do something)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 阿媽，我聽日想食雞脾，得唔得呀？
examples.jyutping: aa3 maa1, ngo5 ting1 jat6 soeng2 sik6 gai1 bei2, dak1 m4 dak1 aa3?
examples.translation: Mum, I want to eat a chicken leg tomorrow, can I?

senses.definition: 詢問對方對某樣嘢嘅意見 (to ask for an opinion, to ask whether something is good)

examples.text: 如果件T裇用紅色嘅袖，咁得唔得呀？
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 gin6 ti1 seot1 jung6 hung4 sik1 ge3 zau6, gam2 dak1 m4 dak1 aa3?
examples.translation: Is it better if I use a red sleeve for the t-shirt?

senses.definition: 當#啤牌「2」係最大嘅牌嗰陣，對呢隻牌嘅稱呼；見#鋤大D（量詞：隻／條） ("two" on playing cards, used only when the rules consider "two" as the highest rank (the card game Big Two))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你一個人揸住三隻Dee，今鋪想輸都難啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jat1 go3 jan2 zaa1 zyu6 saam1 zek3 di2, gam1 pou1 soeng2 syu1 dou1 naan4 laa1.
examples.translation: With three 'two' cards, it's very difficult for you to lose this game.

headword.display: 打劫紅毛鬼，進貢法蘭西
headword.search: 打劫紅毛鬼，進貢法蘭西
headword.normalized: 打劫紅毛鬼，進貢法蘭西

phonetic.original: daa2 gip3 hung4 mou4 gwai2 zeon3 gung3 faat3 laan1 sai1
jyutping: daa2 gip3 hung4 mou4 gwai2 zeon3 gung3 faat3 laan1 sai1

senses.definition: 意思係艱苦經營從外人手上獲取利益，但成果最後都係俾返外人，自己人毫無得益。#紅毛鬼 即西洋人，#法蘭西 即法國。 (Literally: to rob red hair ghost, and tribute to France. Means someone risk their life to rob money from westerners, but then tribute the money to France, which is also westerner, left no money to their own kind of people.)
senses.label: 語句

keywords: 打劫紅毛鬼，進貢法蘭西
daa2 gip3 hung4 mou4 gwai2 zeon3 gung3 faat3 laan1 sai1
daa gip hung mou gwai zeon gung faat laan sai

senses.definition: 隊伍嘅帶頭人或指揮（量詞：個） (captain; team leader)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢哋要聽隊長指揮。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 jiu3 teng1 deoi6 zoeng2 zi2 fai1.
examples.translation: They are under the command of their team leader.

senses.definition: 塑造#道德 價值觀嘅#教育 (moral education)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 德育及公民教育
examples.jyutping: dak1 juk6 kap6 gung1 man4 gaau3 juk6
examples.translation: moral and civic education

senses.definition: 利用生存嘅時間，多數生活委靡先會用呢個字 (to spend time on; generally implies a dismal usage of one's time)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 借貸度日
examples.jyutping: ze3 taai3 dou6 jat6
examples.translation: to live with debt

senses.definition: 指嗰啲擁有較高學歷，但做出一啲不合乎法律或違反道德嘅事嘅人 (The well-educated who had done something not legal or immoral. Literally: study evil book)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 勢力之間發生戰爭 (to go to war; to fight a battle)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢兩個國家打仗打咗好多年。
examples.jyutping: ni1 loeng5 go3 gwok3 gaa1 daa2 zoeng3 daa2 zo2 hou2 do1 nin4.
examples.translation: The two countries have been at war with each other for many years.

senses.definition: 忙碌而陷入混亂 (to work in rush and get into a muddle)

examples.text: 成條 team 趕緊 project 打緊仗，我冇時間傾下個月個典禮點安排啊。
examples.jyutping: sing4 tiu4 tim1 gon2 gan2 po1 zek4 daa2 gan2 zoeng3, ngo5 mou5 si4 gaan3 king1 haa6 go3 jyut6 go3 din2 lai5 dim2 on1 paai4 aa3.
examples.translation: Our whole team is rushing to complete the project, so I don't have time to discuss how to arrange next month's ceremony.

senses.definition: 赤誠、真誠、忠誠嘅心 (loyalty; a loyal heart)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我對你一片丹心，換嚟嘅只有一片苦心。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 deoi3 nei5 jat1 pin3 daan1 sam1, wun6 lai4 ge2 zi2 jau5 jat1 pin3 fu2 sam1.
examples.translation: I am devoted to you, but all I get is heartache.

senses.definition: 一架車嘅車頭貼住或者揩到前邊架車嘅車頭 (to close on one's car's tail; to rear-end)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 後面架貨車成日響度啄尾，趕住去死咩。
examples.translation: The lorry behind us keeps tailgating, what's his hurry?

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
防禦入侵 (to ward sth off; to withstand; to resist)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢抵擋唔住女人嘅誘惑。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dai2 dong2 m4 zyu6 neoi5 jan2 ge3 jau5 waak6.
examples.translation: He can't resist women's advances.

senses.definition: 就算啲嘢食有少少唔乾淨，食咗落肚都唔會有事 (you won't get sick from eating slightly unclean food; literally: big bacteria eat small bacteria)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 大菌食細菌，細菌當補品。
examples.jyutping: daai6 kwan2 sik6 sai3 kwan2, sai3 kwan2 dong3 bou2 ban2.
examples.translation: God made dirt, and dirt don't hurt! (literally 'big bacteria eat small bacteria, and small bacteria are good for your health')

senses.definition: 嚴重地傷害人 (to beat up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你再嘈我就打爆你！
examples.jyutping: nei5 zoi3 cou4 ngo5 zau6 daa2 baau3 nei5!
examples.translation: Please be quiet! Or I'll beat you up!

senses.definition: #打#爆機，即完成電子遊戲，通過晒所有關卡去到結尾 (to win a video game; to complete a level of a game)

examples.text: 終於打爆機喇！
examples.jyutping: zung1 jyu1 daa2 baau3 gei1 laa3!
examples.translation: We finally completed the game!

senses.definition: 冇規律噉擺埋一齊嘅嘢 (heap; pile; stack)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 草堆
examples.jyutping: cou2 deoi1
examples.translation: haystack

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA

理直氣壯，有道理喺手 (righteously; justifiably; legitimately; with good reason; often (but not always) used sarcastically or negatively to refer to people doing unreasonable things while thinking they are in the right)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢明明遲出門所以遲到，仲大條道理賴個巴士司機揸車揸得慢。
examples.translation: He left late and therefore arrived late, but he just blamed the bus driver for driving slowly.

senses.definition: 承受或者忍受唔到某啲嘢（「頂唔順」遠比「頂唔緊」同「頂唔蒲」常見） (to be unable to stand something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢頂唔順佢老闆啲脾氣，所以辭咗職。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ding2 m4 seon6 keoi5 lou5 baan2 di1 pei4 hei3, so2 ji5 ci4 zo2 zik1.
examples.translation: He couldn't put up with his boss's temper, so he quit.

senses.definition: 社會地位高、有錢嘅家庭 (rich family; family of a high social rank)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我阿爺以前喺大户人家做護院。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 aa3 je4 ji5 cin4 hai2 daai6 wu6 jan4 gaa1 zou6 wu6 jyun2.
examples.translation: My grandfather worked as a security guard in a rich family's house.

senses.definition: #電視台 向公眾廣播嘅#節目 (TV programs)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 睇電視
