examples.jyutping: dou6 si2
examples.translation: Taoist priest

senses.definition: #馬路、#街 名，多數用喺連接兩個人口密集區域路 (Road, as a suffix for major road names)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.text: 彌敦道
examples.jyutping: nei4 deon1 dou6
examples.translation: Nathan Road

senses.definition: 北韓、南韓、日本嘅一級行政區名 (prefecture in Japan; province in Korea)

examples.text: #北海道
examples.jyutping: bak1 hoi2 dou6
examples.translation: Hokkaido Prefecture

senses.definition: 嗰陣時；指事件發生嘅時間 (at that time/moment)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 當其時我響自己間房。
examples.jyutping: dong1 kei4 si4 ngo5 hoeng2 zi6 gei2 gaan1 fong2.
examples.translation: I was at my room at that time.

senses.definition: 形容一件事會喺將來某個時間點先發生 (by that time; when the time comes)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 雖然我唔知我幾時會結婚，但係到其時一定會請你㗎！
examples.jyutping: seoi1 jin4 ngo5 m4 zi1 ngo5 gei2 si4 wui5 git3 fan1, daan6 hai6 dou3 kei4 si4 jat1 ding6 wui5 ceng2 nei5 gaa3!
examples.translation: Although I don't know when I will get married, I will definitely invite you to the wedding party when the time comes!

senses.definition: 象徵或者表達一個意思嘅事物 (to represent; to stand for)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 喺中國文化入面，紅色代表喜慶。
examples.jyutping: hai2 zung1 gwok3 man4 faa3 jap6 min6, hung4 sik1 doi6 biu2 hei2 hing3.
examples.translation: In Chinese culture, the colour red represents happiness.

senses.definition: 以其他人嘅名義代為做事 (to do something in the name of somebody; to do something on behalf of somebody; to act for)

examples.text: 我助手會代表我出席會議。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zo6 sau2 wui5 doi6 biu2 ngo5 ceot1 zik6 wui6 ji5.
examples.translation: My assistant will attend the meeting on my behalf.

senses.definition: 即將要面對強大嘅敵人 (in the face of the enemy)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 大敵當前，我哋應該好好合作，而唔係內訌。
examples.jyutping: daai6 dik6 dong1 cin4, ngo5 dei6 jing1 goi1 hou2 hou2 hap6 zok3, ji4 m4 hai6 noi6 hung6.
examples.translation: We should cooperate instead of fighting among ourselves in the face of the enemy.

senses.definition: 指程度達到滿意、足夠為止 (as much as we need or want; to the fullest)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢餐要食到夠。
examples.jyutping: nei1 caan1 jiu3 sik6 dou3 gau3.
examples.translation: We must enjoy the meal to the fullest.

senses.definition: （作為某啲名稱、叫法嘅來源而被引用嘅）歷史故事或者古人文章（量詞：個） (literary or historical reference of a saying or part of a literary work)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 街道命名典故
examples.jyutping: gaai1 dou6 ming6 ming4 din2 gu3
examples.translation: story behind the naming of streets

senses.definition: 用喺一切兜、碗、煲或者類似容器裝嘅嘢 (bowl; pot; anything shaped like a bowl and used as a container)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.text: 一兜米粉
examples.jyutping: jat1 dau1 mai5 fan2
examples.translation: a pot of rice noodles

senses.definition: 十蚊或者十歲 (ten dollars or years old)

examples.text: 我就嚟七兜喇。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zau6 lai4 cat1 dau1 laa3.
examples.translation: I'm turning 70.

senses.definition: 「#友 (jau2) 」嘅量詞 (a measure word for 「#友 (jau2) 」)

examples.text: 十幾兜友
examples.jyutping: sap6 gei2 dau1 jau2
examples.translation: over ten people

senses.definition: 為期唔長；時間唔多 (short; brief; transient)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢會到香港作短暫嘅訪問。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 wui5 dou3 hoeng1 gong2 zok3 dyun2 zaam6 ge3 fong2 man6.
examples.translation: He will come to Hong Kong for a short interview.

senses.definition: #預約 (to reserve a seat; to make a reservation/booking)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你幫我睇下壽司郎有冇得訂位？唔係嘅話要等好耐先至有位。
examples.jyutping: nei5 bong1 ngo5 tai2 haa5 sau6 si1 long4 jau5 mou5 dak1 deng6 wai2? m4 hai6 ge3 waa2 jiu3 dang2 hou2 noi6 sin1 zi3 jau5 wai2.
examples.translation: Is it possible to make a reservation for Sushiro HK? Otherwise, we would have to wait for a long time to find a seat.

senses.definition: 人應對其他人嘅發問嗰陣嘅即時回答 (answer; reply)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 對答如流
examples.jyutping: deoi3 daap3 jyu4 lau4
examples.translation: to reply without any hitch

senses.definition: 表示某種難以忍受嘅程度 (to an unbearable extent)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 今日熱到唔恨。
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 jit6 dou3 m4 han6.
examples.translation: It's unbearably hot today.

senses.definition: 以#折扣 價將貨品賣出 (to give a discount)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 打個八折
examples.translation: 20% discount off

senses.definition: 比喻實際程度低於預期 (to fall short of expectations)

examples.text: 部電動車聲稱叉滿可以行五百公里，一般打個折，實際四百公里左右。
examples.jyutping: bou6 din6 dung6 ce1 seng1 cing1 caa1 mun5 ho2 ji5 haang4 ng5 baak3 gung1 lei5, jat1 bun1 daa2 go3 zit3, sat6 zai3 sei3 baak3 gung1 lei5 zo2 jau6.
examples.translation: The manufacturer claimed that its electric car can do 500km on one charge, but it is expected to make a discount of the statement, the actual distance is about 400 km.

senses.definition: 表示謝意；通常係收到禮物或者有人讚自己嘅時候用 (Thank you; usually used when receiving a gift or compliment)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 多謝你送本書俾我啊！
examples.jyutping: do1 ze6 nei5 sung3 bun2 syu1 bei2 ngo5 aa3.
examples.translation: Thanks for giving me the book!

senses.definition: 緩和對峙、衝突嘅氣氛 (to smooth something over; to mediate a dispute; to make peace)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢哋嘅爭拗各有各道理，最後由老細打圓場，話兩個人嘅提議都會試吓。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 ge3 zang1 aau3 gok3 jau5 gok3 dou6 lei5, zeoi3 hau6 jau4 lou5 sai3 daa2 jyun4 coeng4, waa6 loeng5 go3 jan4 ge3 tai4 ji5 dou1 wui5 si3 haa5.
examples.translation: Both of them argued convincingly for their proposals. In the end, the boss settled the matter by  saying he would try out both.

senses.definition: 指物件細隻又趣緻；精巧 ((of small objects) small and cute; tiny and lovely; delicate)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你睇，嗰間玩具屋仔幾的式！
examples.jyutping: nei5 tai2, go2 gaan1 wun6 geoi6 uk1 zai2 gei2 dik1 sik1!
examples.translation: Look, how small and delicate that toy house is!

senses.definition: 建築物嘅地下層；可以多過一層，樓層越深，層數越大（量詞：個／層） ((of buildings) basement)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 地庫二樓
examples.jyutping: dei6 fu3 ji6 lau2
examples.translation: basement second floor

senses.definition: 反覆噉將一啲嘢放喺另一樣嘢上面；係一種擺嘢嘅方法，將啲嘢嘅高度增加，減少存放用嘅面積 (to pile up; to place one on top of the other)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 班長疊起同學交嘅功課簿，然後先放入簿櫃。
examples.jyutping: baan1 coeng4 dip6 hei2 tung4 hok6 gaau1 ge3 gung1 fo3 bou2, jin4 hau6 sin1 fong3 jap6 bou2 gwai6.
examples.translation: The monitor piled up workbooks handed in by students before putting them into the bookshelf.

senses.definition: 擁有好多一樣或者相近嘅嘢，係比較舊嘅俗語 (to be in possession of a great number of something)

examples.text: #疊馬
examples.jyutping: daap6 maa5
examples.translation: to have a lot of followers or underlings

senses.definition: 好肯定咁講一樣嘢 (to make a statement with utmost certainty; to assert; to affirm; to asseverate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢根據化石研究所得結果，斷言恐龍係因為隕石而絕種。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gan1 geoi3 faa3 sek6 jin4 gau3 so2 dak1 git3 gwo2, dyun6 jin4 hung2 lung4 hai6 jan1 wai6 wan5 sek6 ji4 zyut6 zung2.
examples.translation: He affirmed that the extinction of dinosaurs was caused by a massive meteorite, citing research about recovered fossils.

senses.definition: 一對噉 (in a pair; in pairs)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我同你打孖上，贏個雙打冠軍返嚟。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 tung4 nei5 daa2 maa1 soeng5, jeng4 go3 soeng1 daa2 gun3 gwan1 faan1 lei4.
examples.translation: We shall team as a pair and win the doubles championship.

senses.definition: 指一般大眾都會接受同鍾意 (acceptable and appealing to the masses)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢間酒樓嘅價錢都好大眾化。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 zau2 lau4 ge3 gaa3 cin4 dou1 hou2 daai6 zung3 faa3.
examples.translation: This restaurant's prices are catered for the mass.

senses.definition: 事情嘅階段，通常指已經去到好難挽回嘅階段（量詞：個） (extent; condition; situation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你點會搞到噉嘅地步㗎？
examples.jyutping: nei5 dim2 wui5 gaau2 dou3 gam2 ge3 dei6 bou6 gaa3?
examples.translation: How did you get yourself into such a mess?

senses.definition: 用槍械射擊標靶 (to participate in target shooting)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 練習打靶
examples.jyutping: lin6 zaap6 daa2 baa2
examples.translation: to practise shooting

senses.definition: #槍斃，死刑嘅其中一種；引申為判死刑嘅意思 (to execute by shooting or firing squad; also means receiving capital punishment in general by extension)

examples.text: 呢啲壞人最好就係捉佢哋去打靶嘞。
examples.jyutping: ni1 di1 waai6 jan4 zeoi3 hou2 zau6 hai6 zuk1 keoi5 dei6 heoi3 daa2 baa2 laak3.
examples.translation: These bad people should be executed.

senses.definition: 金融用語，指期貨、期權、窩輪或牛熊證因到期或觸發行使價而除牌 (to suspend trading of futures, options or warrants due to expiry or being exercised)

examples.text: 無喇，之前買落嘅輪都打晒靶。
examples.jyutping: mou5 laa3, zi1 cin4 maai5 lok6 ge3 leon2 dou1 daa2 saai3 baa2.
examples.translation: Oh no, all warrants in my portfolio were called.

senses.definition: 彎低、垂低 (to bend; to lower)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 耷低個頭
examples.jyutping: dap1 dai1 go3 tau4
examples.translation: to lower one's head

senses.definition: 情緒低落，冇厘神氣 (to feel utterly dispirited; to feel blue)

examples.text: 近排心情做乜咁耷啊？
examples.jyutping: gan6 paai2 sam1 cing4 zou6 mat1 gam3 dap1 aa3?
examples.translation: Why are you so depressed lately?

senses.definition: 踩（煞車掣）；煞車 (to stop or slow down a vehicle using a brake)

examples.text: 耷迫力
examples.jyutping: dap1 bik6 lik1
examples.translation: to brake

senses.definition: #避；#遮掩 (to avoid; to take cover from)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 擋雨
examples.jyutping: dong2 jyu5
examples.translation: to take cover from the rain

senses.definition: #阻塞 (to block off)

examples.text: 前面條路俾架貨車擋住咗。
examples.jyutping: cin4 min6 tiu4 lou6 bei2 gaa3 fo3 ce1 dong2 zyu6 zo2.
examples.translation: The road ahead is blocked by a truck.

senses.definition: #抵禦 (to parry; to block)

examples.text: 我擋咗佢一拳。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dong2 zo2 keoi5 jat1 kyun4.
examples.translation: I blocked his punch.

senses.definition: #打交 打得好起勁 (to fight very vigorously)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢琴日同人打大交嚟，搞到周身都係傷。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 kam4 jat6 tung4 jan4 daa2 daai6 gaau1 lai4, gaau2 dou3 zau1 san1 dou1 hai6 soeng1.
examples.translation: He had a serious fight with others yesterday and he got badly hurt.

senses.definition: 人嘅背景資料同佢做過嘅事 (background, identity and past record)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你負責查呢條友嘅底細，我去跟蹤佢。
examples.jyutping: nei5 fu6 zaak3 caa4 ni1 tiu4 jau2 ge3 dai2 sai3, ngo5 heoi3 gan1 zung1 keoi5.
examples.translation: You check the background of this guy. I will follow him.

senses.definition: 喺#極性 嘅#溶劑 入面溶解之後，會形成導電嘅#溶液 嘅物質 (electrolyte)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 做完運動，記得要補充電解質。
examples.jyutping: zou6 jyun4 wan6 dung6, gei3 dak1 jiu3 bou2 cung1 din6 gaai2 zat1.
examples.translation: After exercise, remember to supplement electrolytes.

senses.definition: 為保密或者方便而起嘅稱號（量詞：個） (code name)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 警方今次嘅行動代號係「寒戰」。
examples.jyutping: ging2 fong1 gam1 ci3 ge3 hang4 dung6 doi6 hou6 hai2 "hon4 zin3".
examples.translation: The code name of this police mission is "Cold War".

senses.definition: 修飾貶義形容詞，程度達到極致 (use to describe the extreme extent of a bad situation)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 又踩到「黃金」，今日真係衰到貼地！
examples.jyutping: jau6 caai2 dou2 "wong4 gam1", gam1 jat6 zan1 hai6 seoi1 dou3 tip3 dei2!
examples.translation: Stepped on dog poo again. This is such a horrible day!

senses.definition: 一次過好痛快噉食好多嘢 (to pig out)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 考完試終於可以大吃大喝喇。
examples.jyutping: haau2 jyun4 si3 zung1 jyu1 ho2 ji5 daai6 hek3 daai6 hot3 laa3.
examples.translation: The exam finally ends and it's time for me to pig out.

senses.definition: 俾雨水、其他類型嘅水整濕，水嘅型態通常會係細而密集 (to get soaked, usually due to rain)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我畀雨揼濕咗。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 bei2 jyu5 dam1 sap1 zo2.
examples.translation: I got wet in the rain.

senses.definition: 轉嚟轉去、係噉兜圈；經常出現 (to spin around; to revolve; to appear frequently)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個膠袋喺空中係噉打轉。
examples.jyutping: go3 gaau1 doi2 hai2 hung1 zung1 hai6 gam2 daa2 zyun2.
examples.translation: The plastic bag spins around in the air.

senses.definition: 觸發事件嘅直接近因（量詞：條） (direct and immediate cause that touches off another event; trigger; spark)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 戰爭嘅導火線
examples.jyutping: zin3 zang1 ge3 dou6 fo2 sin3
examples.translation: an incident that triggered the war

senses.definition: 引爆爆炸物嘅引線（量詞：條） (fuse)

examples.text: 你要燃點條導火線先可以引爆個炸藥。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jiu3 jin4 dim2 tiu4 dou6 fo2 sin3 sin1 ho2 ji5 jan5 baau3 go3 zaa3 joek6.
examples.translation: You need to light the fuse to explode the explosive.

senses.definition: #倒立；頭向地，腳向天，好似棵#葱 噉 (to turn or hang upside down)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 弊！阿仔倒豎葱噉跌咗落牀呀！
examples.jyutping: bai6! aa3 zai2 dou2 syu6 cung1 gam2 dit3 zo2 lok6 cong4 aa3!
examples.translation: Oh my god! Our son fell off his bed facing down!

senses.definition: 光住腳、冇着鞋襪噉行 (to go barefoot)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你做咩打赤腳啊？
examples.jyutping: nei5 zou6 me1 daa2 cek3 goek3 aa3?
examples.translation: Why do you walk barefoot?

senses.definition: 相似嘅對象；……之類嘅嘢 (similar reference)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 有影評話《時光逆愛90年》係《奇幻逆緣》啲 friend。
examples.jyutping: jau5 jing2 ping4 waa6 si4 gwong1 jik6 oi3 gau2 sap6 nin4 hai6 kei4 waan6 jik6 jyun4 di1 fen1.
examples.translation: Some film reviews say that "Age of Adaline" is similar to "The Curious Case of Benjamin Button".

senses.definition: #羅馬字母、希臘字母等嘅一種字體，平時用喺句頭或者專名第一個字母 (capital letter)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 寫人哋個名一定要用大階開頭，寫細階係好無禮貌㗎。
examples.jyutping: se2 jan4 dei6 go3 meng2 jat1 ding6 jiu3 jung6 daai6 gaai1 hoi1 tau4, se2 sai3 gaai1 hai6 hou2 mou5 lai5 maau6 gaa3.
examples.translation: You have to capitalize the first character when writing a person's name, it is impolite to write it in lowercase.

senses.definition: #羅馬字母、希臘字母等嘅一種字體，平時用喺句頭或者專名第一個字母之外 (lowercase letter)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 中國數字比較多筆劃嘅寫法，即係壹、貳、叁、肆、伍、陸、柒、捌、玖、拾 (complex way of writing numbers in Chinese)

examples.text: 用中文寫支票嘅話最好用大寫。
examples.jyutping: jung6 zung1 man2 se2 zi1 piu3 ge3 waa2 zeoi3 hou2 jung6 daai6 se2.
examples.translation: You had better use the complex way of writing numbers while writing cheques.

senses.definition: 喺地下嗰層嘅舖頭，通常指對住條街嘅舖頭（量詞：間／個） (shop on the ground floor)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 地舖嘅租金比較貴。
examples.jyutping: dei6 pou3 ge3 zou1 gam1 bei2 gaau3 gwai3.
examples.translation: Leases on the ground floor are more expensive.

senses.definition: 有規模嘅#酒店（量詞：間） (grand hotel)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 荷里活有間大酒店，三個肥婆學踢波。（歌詞）
examples.jyutping: ho4 lei5 wut6 jau5 gaan1 daai6 zau2 dim3, saam1 go3 fei4 po4 hok6 tek3 bo1.
examples.translation: There's a grand hotel in Hollywood. Three fat women were playing soccer there. (lyrics)

senses.definition: #殯儀館 嘅隱語 (funeral home; funeral parlour)

examples.text: 朋友前幾日過咗身，聽日去大酒店見佢最後一面。
examples.jyutping: pang4 jau5 cin4 gei2 jat6 gwo3 zo2 san1, ting1 jat6 heoi3 daai6 zau2 dim3 gin3 keoi5 zeoi3 hau6 jat1 min6.
examples.translation: My friend passed away a few days ago. I will go to the funeral parlor tomorrow to say farewell to him.

senses.definition: 抑或係，一般用於選擇疑問句 (or (only used in a question indicating options))
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 你鍾意食豬肉定牛肉？
examples.jyutping: nei5 zung1 ji3 sik6 zyu1 juk6 ding6 ngau4 juk6?
examples.translation: Which do you prefer, beef or pork?

senses.definition: 經過特殊訓練，執行重要任務嘅人員（量詞：個） (special agent)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我懷疑我鄰居係特工嚟嘅。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 waai4 ji4 ngo5 leon4 geoi1 hai6 dak6 gung1 lai4 ge3.
examples.translation: I suspect my neighbour is a special agent.

senses.definition: 得嗰個人或者嗰樣嘢有嘅 (to uniquely possess)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢種發展模式並唔係香港所獨有。
examples.jyutping: ni1 zung2 faat3 zin2 mou4 sik1 bing6 m4 hai6 hoeng1 gong2 so2 duk6 jau5.
examples.translation: This pattern of development is not unique to Hong Kong.

senses.definition: 單獨苟且過活 (to survive alone)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 國破家亡，留我一個人獨生仲有咩嘢用？
examples.jyutping: gwok3 po3 gaa1 mong4, lau4 ngo5 jat1 go3 jan4 duk6 sang1 zung6 jau5 me1 je5 jung6?
examples.translation: My country is in ruins, how can I bear the guilt of surviving alone?

senses.definition: 升職方式之一；將員工派去另一個部門做更高嘅職位 (to be transfer and promote, usually within a large organization)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 公司決定調升佢去倫敦做地區總經理。
examples.jyutping: gung1 si1 kyut3 ding6 diu6 sing1 keoi5 heoi3 leon4 deon1 zou6 dei6 keoi1 zung2 ging1 lei5.
examples.translation: The company promoted him as the general manager of the London offices.

senses.definition: 將1除以一個唔等於0嘅數，得出嘅#商 就係被除數嘅倒數（量詞：個） ((math.) reciprocal)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 正整數越大，倒數越細；負整數越大，倒數越大。
examples.jyutping: zing3 zing2 sou3 jyut6 daai6, dou2 sou3 jyut6 sai3, fu6 zing2 sou3 jyut6 daai6, dou2 sou3 jyut6 daai6.
examples.translation: The greater a positive integer is, the smaller its reciprocal is; the greater a negative integer is, the greater its reciprocal is.

senses.definition: 用嚟輸送電力或者訊號嘅纜線，大部分由#銅 或者#鋁 製成，通常有絕緣層包住（量詞：條） (electric cable)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 海底電纜
examples.jyutping: hoi2 dai2 din6 laam6
examples.translation: submarine cable; undersea cable

senses.definition: #支票#兑現 唔到，彈回頭或者話退返轉頭（通常係因為開出支票嘅户口唔夠錢） (to bounce a cheque)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 十二月份糧居然彈票。
examples.jyutping: sap6 ji6 jyut6 fan6 loeng4 geoi1 jin2 daan6 piu3.
examples.translation: The paycheque for December was, to my surprise, bounced by the bank.

senses.definition: 呈圓筒、柱狀、衫鈕狀，用嚟提供電力嘅小型容器（量詞：嚿／粒） (battery (cylindrical in shape or shaped like a button, and of a size that can fit into the palm))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 換電芯
examples.jyutping: wun6 din6 sam1
examples.translation: to replace the batteries

senses.definition: 多個人或者群體嘅談話；談判（量詞：段） (dialogue; conversation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 管理層同罷工嘅工人展開咗對話。
examples.jyutping: gun2 lei5 cang4 tung4 baa6 gung1 ge3 gung1 jan4 zin2 hoi1 zo2 deoi3 waa6.
examples.translation: Management opened a dialogue with the striking workers.

senses.definition: 設計成#衫袋 大細嘅書，專門設計出嚟方便讀者（量詞：本） (pocket-sized book)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢間出版社出啲袋裝書好精巧。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 ceot1 baan2 se5 ceot1 di1 doi6 zong1 syu1 hou2 zing1 haau2.
examples.translation: The pocket-sized books published by this publisher are delicate.

senses.definition: 中式甜品，由黃豆榨汁凝結而成，成品係白色實色布甸狀，加入糖或者糖水令佢變成甜品；亦有人會加其他配料，令口感更加豐富（量詞：碗／桶） (bean curd pudding, bean curd dessert)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我要一碗熱嘅豆腐花。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jiu3 jat1 wun2 jit6 ge3 dau6 fu6 faa1.
examples.translation: I would like a bowl of hot bean curd pudding.

senses.definition: 面對面；現身 (in somebody's presence; face to face)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 呢個問題我想當面同佢講清楚。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 man6 tai4 ngo5 soeng2 dong1 min2 tung4 keoi5 gong2 cing1 co2.
examples.translation: I want to straighten out this problem with him face to face.

senses.definition: 指電機主機以外嘅產品，如#鍵盤、#滑鼠、#喇叭 (computer peripherals)
senses.label: 名詞

phonetic.original: dit1 dit1 daak1 daak1:di4 di1 daak6 daak6

senses.definition: 模擬水滴、馬蹄或鐘擺左右擺動嘅聲音。 (onomatopoeia of water-drops, gee-up or pendulum)
senses.label: 擬聲詞

examples.text: 佢個人好醒瞓，凡親落雨「啲啲咑咑」，就會瞓唔到覺。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 go3 jan4 hou2 seng2 fan3, faan4 can1 lok6 jyu5 dit1 dit1 daak1 daak1, zau6 wui5 fan3 m4 dou2 gaau3.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]He is a light sleeper, even the slightest sound of rain will keep him awake.

keywords: dit1 dit1 daak1 daak1:di4 di1 daak6 daak6

senses.definition: 目不轉睛噉望到實一實 (to stare at)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 同我𥄫住佢，我出一出去。
examples.jyutping: tung4 ngo5 gap6 zyu6 keoi5, ngo5 ceot1 jat1 ceot1 heoi3.
examples.translation: Keep an eye on her. I have to go out for a while.

senses.definition: 目光專注咁上下掃視對方，希望從外表獲取資訊，多指不懷好意 (to size up someone; to watch someone to see if they are up to no good)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 嗰條友眼定定咁打量咗我哋好耐，會唔會有咩企圖？
examples.jyutping: go2 tiu4 jau2 ngaan5 ding6 ding6 gam2 daa2 loeng6 zo2 ngo5 dei6 hou2 noi6, wui5 m4 wui5 jau5 me1 kei5 tou4.
examples.translation: That guy has been sizing us up for some time. Does he have malicious intentions?

senses.definition: 做一啲嘢嚟到暫時滿足一下對某樣嘢嘅慾望或者依賴 (to satisfy a craving or addiction temporarily)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 睇預告嚟頂住癮先囉。
examples.jyutping: tai2 jyu6 gou3 lai4 ding2 zyu6 jan5 sin1 lo1.
examples.translation: Watch the trailer to satisfy your craving for some time then.

senses.definition: 唔係真人拍攝，而係畫出嚟嘅影片；唔一定係完全用人手畫，可以用電腦輔助 (animation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 動畫製作
examples.jyutping: dung6 waa2 zai3 zok3
examples.translation: animation production

senses.definition: 驅動 (to spur on; to drive)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 政府希望呢啲措施可以帶動經濟復甦。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 hei1 mong6 ne1 di1 cou3 si1 ho2 ji5 daai3 dung6 ging1 zai3 fuk6 sou1.
examples.translation: The government hopes that these measures will spearhead an economic recovery.

senses.definition: 人造嘅地底房間，或者建築物嘅地下層（#地庫） (dungeon; basement)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 百貨公司地牢多數賣食物。
examples.jyutping: baak3 fo3 gung1 si1 dei6 lou4 do1 sou3 maai6 sik6 mat6.
examples.translation: The basement of the department store usually sells food.

senses.definition: 喺某地方、圈子低調噉消失、離開 (to fade out)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個女影星結咗婚就淡出影壇。
examples.jyutping: go3 neoi5 jing2 sing1 git3 zo2 fan1 zau6 daam6 ceot1 jing2 taan4.
examples.translation: That actress faded out of the show business after she got married.

senses.definition: 冷靜；唔怯場 (calm and unhurried; composed)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢呢次上台演講，表現得好淡定。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ni1 ci3 soeng5 toi4 jin2 gong2, biu2 jin2 dak1 hou2 daam6 ding6.
examples.translation: He gives an excellent speech calmly this time.

senses.definition: 令人安心嘅承諾或者措施（量詞：粒） (something that helps to set one's mind at ease; literally: fix heart pill)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢為員工大派定心丸，承諾今年一定唔會裁員。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 wai6 jyun4 gung1 daai6 paai3 ding6 sam1 jyun2, sing4 nok6 gam1 nin2 jat1 ding6 m4 wui5 coi4 jyun4.
examples.translation: He set the minds of his staff at ease by making a promise that there would be no sackings this year.

senses.definition: 要求主持或者其他人播或者唱某一首歌 (to request a song; to ask or order to include a song on the radio, in a show, or in karaoke)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 打去電台點歌
examples.jyutping: daa2 heoi3 din6 toi4 dim2 go1
examples.translation: to phone in a radio programme to request a song

senses.definition: 一個俾人用錢請佢#打交 或者提供相關服務嘅#男人；武打演員 (bodyguard; bouncer; tough-guy; hired fighter; action-movie actor)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 打仔格
examples.jyutping: daa2 zai2 gaak3
examples.translation: tough-guy style

senses.definition: 同#凸 ，通常專指空間上嘅突出 (to protrude)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢粒癦係凸出嚟嘅。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 nap1 mak2 hai6 dat6 ceot1 lai4 ge3.
examples.translation: He has a protruding mole.

senses.definition: 懇切噉催促 (to call for; to urge; to press for)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 校方敦促學生守校規。
examples.jyutping: haau6 fong1 deon1 cuk1 hok6 saang1 sau2 haau6 kwai1.
examples.translation: The school authority urges students to abide by school rules.

senses.definition: 一條線、一條管嘅頭尾 (a side or an end of something (usually a string, rope or tube))
senses.label: 語素

examples.text: 水管嘅兩端
examples.jyutping: seoi2 gun2 ge3 loeng5 dyun1
examples.translation: both ends of a pipe

senses.definition: 事物嘅起因 (origin)

examples.text: #禍端
examples.jyutping: wo6 dyun1
examples.translation: origin of a calamity

senses.definition: #人龍；#排隊 嘅時候，一個跟一個嘅人群（量詞：條） (queue; line)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 條隊好長喎。
examples.jyutping: tiu4 deoi2 hou2 coeng4 wo3.
examples.translation: That's a long queue.

senses.definition: 未得到應有利益之餘，反而要倒過嚟出錢；（多數指金錢上嘅）虧損 (to cover the loss; to bail out a company; to keep a company afloat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我做嘢唔係為錢，鐘意嘅話，倒貼都冇所謂。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zou6 je5 m4 hai6 wai6 cin2, zung1 ji3 ge3 waa2, dou3 tip3 dou1 mou5 so2 wai6.
examples.translation: I don't work for the money, it doesn't matter if I have to cover the loss.

senses.definition: 喺傳統嘅性別定型中，指情侶嘅女方出錢供養男方 ((of females) to pay for the upkeep of one's male lover in traditional gender stereotypes)

examples.text: 如果個老公要你倒貼，噉不如唔嫁！
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 go3 lou5 gung1 jiu3 nei5 dou3 tip3, gam2 bat1 jyu4 m4 gaa3!
examples.translation: If you have to pay for the upkeep of your husband, then why don't you remain single?

senses.definition: 突然、無啦啦加入其他人嘅對話 (to interrupt or break into a conversation of others abruptly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 頭先搭爹嗰個邊個嚟？
examples.jyutping: tau4 sin1 daap3 de1 go2 go3 bin1 go3 lai4?
examples.translation: Who was the guy joining our conversation?

senses.definition: 利用極低價錢招徠客人，破壞行業生態；同類嘅商品服務，可能被迫跟住減價，令同行蒙受損失。 (to drive down the market; to ruin the market by undercutting everyone else's price; to spoil everyone's business by offering very low prices)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 《東陽報》啱啱推出嗰陣，用割喉戰頂爛市，只係賣兩蚊，搞到其他對手要陪佢減價，甚至要送利是。
examples.jyutping: dung1 joeng4 bou3 aam1 aam1 teoi1 ceot1 go2 zan2, jung6 got3 hau4 zin3 ding2 laan6 si5, zi2 hai6 maai6 loeng5 man1, gaau2 dou3 kei4 taa1 deoi3 sau2 jiu3 pui4 keoi5 gaam2 gaa3, sam6 zi3 jiu3 sung3 lai6 si6.
examples.translation: Oriental Sun Post" made cut-throat price competition by selling at $2 only when it started publication, forced its competitor to follow, and even gave red pockets.

senses.definition: 擺架子；矯形造作 (to put on airs)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢之前同男朋友嗌交，一見到佢就敦起個款。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zi1 cin4 tung4 naam4 pang4 jau5 aai3 gaau1, jat1 gin3 dou2 keoi5 zau6 deon1 hei2 go3 fun2.
examples.translation: She had a fight with her boyfriend and started to put on airs once she sees him.

senses.definition: #承載、帶有#氧氣 (to carry oxygen)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 一氧化碳會降低血液帶氧嘅能力。
examples.jyutping: jat1 joeng5 faa3 taan3 wui5 gong3 dai1 hyut3 jik6 daai3 joeng5 ge3 nang4 lik6.
examples.translation: Carbon monoxide decreases the oxygen carrying capacity of blood.

senses.definition: 淨係識#讀書，唔識得活用書本上嘅知識。 (Literally "to study dead books", figuratively "to acquire knowledge but unable to apply it flexibly".)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿松淨係識得讀死書，睇完啲#經濟學 理論就走去開#公司，結果#破產。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 zing6 hai6 sik1 dak1 duk6 sei2 syu1, tai2 jyun4 di1 ging1 zai3 lei5 leon6 zau6 zau2 heoi3 hoi1 gung1 si1, git3 gwo2 po3 caan2.
examples.translation: A-chung learnt much but couldn't apply what he's learned. He went on to start his own company after reading some economics theory and ended up bankrupt.

senses.definition: 被父母、老師等地位較高嘅人指責果陣反駁對方 (to contradict, esp. one's superior, parents, etc.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔好頂撞你媽咪啊！
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 ding2 zong6 nei5 maa1 mi4 aa3
examples.translation: Don't contradict your mother!

senses.definition: 分配同安置人力 (to distribute manpower)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 高層正喺度調兵遣將，接手呢一項大計劃。
examples.jyutping: gou1 cang4 zing3 hai2 dou6 diu6 bing1 hin2 zoeng3, zip6 sau2 ni1 jat1 hong6 daai6 gai3 waak6.
examples.translation: The managers are distributing manpower to prepare for a big project.

senses.definition: 變得成熟；成為大人 (to be grown-up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢想個仔大個做醫生。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 soeng2 go3 zai2 daai6 go3 zou6 ji1 sang1.
examples.translation: She wants her son to be a doctor when he grows up.

senses.definition: 提交畀會議辯論同表決嘅正式提議（量詞：個／項） (motion)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 提出動議
examples.jyutping: tai4 ceot1 dung6 ji5
examples.translation: to propose or put forward a motion

senses.definition: 兩個或以上嘅人彼此攻擊對方嘅身體 (to fight; to come to blows)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你兩個唔好再打交喇！
examples.jyutping: nei5 loeng5 go3 m4 hou2 zoi3 daa2 gaau1 laa3!
examples.translation: Hey you two, stop fighting!

senses.definition: 有好嚴重嘅後果 (in serious trouble; disastrous)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你打爛咗佢好鍾意嗰個花樽！你今次大劑喇！
examples.jyutping: nei5 daai2 laan6 zo2 keoi5 hou2 zung1 ji3 go2 go3 faa1 zeon1! nei5 gam1 ci3 daai6 zai1 laa3!
examples.translation: You broke her favourite vase! This time you're in serious trouble!

senses.definition: 將條#呔 圍住條#頸，之後打結，或者打好結之後穿過個#頭 纜落條頸度，成為衣着嘅一部份 (to wear a tie; to put on a tie)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢返工要打呔。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 faan1 gung1 jiu3 daa2 taai1.
examples.translation: He needs to wear a tie to work.

senses.definition: 喺條#呔 打結整返個形 (to tie a knot in a tie)

examples.text: 好多細路仔唔識得打呔。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 sai3 lou6 zai2 m4 sik1 dak1 daa2 taai1.
examples.translation: Many children don't know how to tie in a knot in a tie.

senses.definition: 自己一個人喺度，冇其他人 (to be alone; to be in solitude)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔好煩我，我想獨處下。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 faan4 ngo5, ngo5 soeng2 duk6 cyu3 haa5.
examples.translation: Don't bother me. I want to be alone.

senses.definition: 喺一個人面前 (to one's face; in the presence of another person)
senses.label: 介詞

examples.text: 佢當住我屋企人面前向我求婚。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dong1 zyu6 ngo5 uk1 kei2 jan4 min6 cin4 hoeng3 ngo5 kau4 fan1.
examples.translation: He proposed to me in the presence of my family.

senses.definition: #OK、冇問題（一定要用喺否定或者反問） (okay; fine (must be used in negation or rhetorical question))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: #唔得掂
examples.jyutping: m4 dak1 dim6
examples.translation: not okay

senses.definition: 一心一意；專心 (to focus on a task; to concentrate on what one is doing)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 唔同你哋傾住，疊埋心水寫好篇文先。
examples.jyutping: m4 tung4 nei5 dei6 king1 zyu6, dip6 maai4 sam1 seoi2 se2 hou2 pin1 man2 sin1.
examples.translation: I'll stop chatting with you all. Let me focus on finishing my article instead.

senses.definition: 喺⋯⋯嘅時候 (when; while; just at)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 當黑色暴雨警告信號發出嘅時候，市民應該留喺安全嘅地方暫避。
examples.jyutping: dong1 hak1 sik1 bou6 jyu5 ging2 gou3 seon3 hou6 faat3 ceot1 ge3 si4 hau6, si5 man4 jing1 goi1 lau4 hai2 on1 cyun4 ge3 dei6 fong1 zaam6 bei6.
examples.translation: When the black rainstorm signal is issued, people should take shelter in a safe place.

senses.definition: 斷斷續續咁拖延時間 (to procrastinate; literally: to delay a little)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 做功課就專心啲啦，揼揼下又到半夜都未做完。
examples.jyutping: zou6 gung1 fo3 zau6 zyun1 sam1 di1 laa1, dam1 dam1 haa5 jau6 dou3 bun3 je2 dou1 mei6 zou6 jyun4
examples.translation: You better be focusing on the homework. Your procrastination leaves it unfinished till midnight again.

senses.definition: 掌握他人心理活動嘅一種能力 (mind reading; the ability to read people's mind through the observation of people's body languages and facial expressions)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢知道我講緊大話，唔通佢有讀心術?
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zi1 dou3 ngo5 gong2 gan2 daai6 waa6, m4 tung1 keoi5 jau5 duk6 sam1 seot6?
examples.translation: She knows I am lying. Does she have the ability to read my mind?

senses.definition: 專門向到場瀏覽嘅遊客講解嘅人；負責#導賞 嘅人（量詞：個） (docent)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 導賞員訓練
examples.jyutping: dou6 soeng2 jyun4 fan3 lin6
examples.translation: docent training

senses.definition: 由專人向遊客解釋某啲內容，令遊客更識得欣賞嗰啲嘢 (to run a guided tour)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: #導賞員
examples.jyutping: dou6 soeng2 jyun4
examples.translation: docent

senses.definition: 「手指屈肌腱鞘炎」嘅俗稱，令人嘅手指伸直屈曲有困難 (trigger finger)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我阿媽喺酒樓洗碗操勞過度，而家有彈弓手。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 aa3 maa1 hai2 zau2 lau4 sai2 wun2 cou1 lou4 gwo3 dou6, ji4 gaa1 jau5 daan6 gung1 sau2.
examples.translation: My mother has been working too hard washing up dishes at the Chinese restaurant, causing her to have trigger fingers.

senses.definition: 事情始末嘅細微跡象 (faint sense of the truth)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢從眾多嘅證據之中開始睇到呢單案嘅端倪。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 cung4 zung3 do1 ge3 zing3 geoi3 zi1 zung1 hoi1 ci2 tai2 dou2 ni1 daan1 ngon3 ge3 dyun1 ngai4.
examples.translation: Through countless pieces of evidence, he grasped a faint sense of the truth of this case.

senses.definition: 用算盤計數 (to use an abacus)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 公公喺我細個嗰陣教過我打算盤，不過太耐冇用唔記得晒嚕。
examples.jyutping: gung1 gung1 hai2 ngo5 sai3 go3 go2 zan6 gaau3 gwo3 ngo5 daa2 syun3 pun4, bat1 gwo3 taai3 noi6 mou5 jung6 m4 gei3 dak1 saai3 lou1.
examples.translation: When I was small, my grandpa used to teach me how to use an abacus, but it was too long ago since my last touch on the abacus, I have forgotten most of it.

senses.definition: 有好多機會揾錢同名利 (to have many chances to make money or to earn fame)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 老細咁鍾意你，你大把世界啦！
examples.jyutping: lou5 sai3 gam3 zung1 ji3 nei5, nei5 daai6 baa2 sai3 gaai3 laa1!
examples.translation: Boss likes you a lot! You must have a lot of opportunities to make money and earn fame!

senses.definition: 上下大幅震動、跳動 (to bump up and down; to bob up and down)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 架車扽到我頭暈。
examples.jyutping: gaa3 ce1 dan3 dou3 ngo5 tau4 wan4
examples.translation: The car was bumping up and down so much that it made me dizzy.

senses.definition: 上下擺動一樣嘢嚟整走黐住係上邊嘅依附物 (to shake away by moving up and down)

examples.text: 扽乾淨件衫啲餅碎喇！
examples.jyutping: dan3 gon1 zeng6 gin6 saam1 di1 beng2 seoi3 laa3!
examples.translation: Shake away the crumbs that are on your clothes.

senses.definition: 物件以底部或面積較小嗰一端跌落，重擊地面或枱面發出悶響；人跌低果陣屁股著地 (to fall; (of an object) to drop such that the bottom or smaller end makes a thud when colliding with the ground or a surface; (of a person) to fall down landing on one's butt)

examples.text: 佢坐唔正張凳，扽咗落地。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 co5 m4 zing3 zoeng1 dang3, dan3 zo2 lok6 dei6
examples.translation: He didn't sit properly in the chair, so he fell on the floor.

senses.definition: 比喻數字、等級忽然下跌 ((of a number or class) figuratively, to fall or drop suddenly)

examples.text: 恒指一日間由2萬點扽到落1萬5千點。
examples.jyutping: hang4 zi2 jat1 jat6 gaan1 jau4 ji6 maan6 dim2 dan3 dou3 lok6 jat1 maan6 ng5 cin1 dim2
examples.translation: The Hang Seng Index fell from 20,000 to 15,000 in just one day.

senses.definition: 表現極為出眾 (to be outstanding)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢喺依個舞蹈比賽度大放異彩，搶晒啲風頭。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai2 ji1 go3 mou5 dou6 bei2 coi3 dou6 daai6 fong3 ji6 coi2, coeng2 saai3 di2 fung1 tau4.
examples.translation: His dancing is so outstanding that sets others apart. He becomes the spotlight of the competition.

senses.definition: 小心、謹慎行事；留意身邊環境 (to be cautious; to pay attention to one's surroundings; literally: to bring eyes)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: #帶眼識人
examples.translation: to see clearly whether others are good or bad people

senses.definition: 以前嘅人用#擔挑 拎豬仔去市集買，豬仔響擔挑一邊籃，而另一邊就放舊咁上下重嘅石嚟戥返勻兩邊重量，舊石就叫戥豬石。後來演變成#戥穿石(婚禮中嘅#兄弟)。類似#搭秤。 (the rocks added as a balancing weight when taking piggies with carrying pole)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 比喻臨時被採用嘅人、#陪襯 品、#配角。 (figuratively the temporary staff,  supporting role.)

examples.text: 喂大佬你係戥豬石嚟咋，你當正自己係主角呀？
examples.jyutping: wai3 daai6 lou2 nei5 hai6 dang6 zyu1 sek6 lei4 zaa3, nei5 dong3 zeng3 zi6 gei2 hai6 zyu2 gok3 aa4
examples.translation: Hey dude, you are just a supporting role. Do you think you are a superstar here?

senses.definition: 大口徑嘅#炮（量詞：支／碌） (large cannon)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 燈塔附近有四支大炮。
examples.jyutping: dang1 taap3 fu6 gan6 jau5 sei3 zi1 daai6 paau3
examples.translation: There are four cannons near the lighthouse.

senses.definition: 直徑相對大嘅#相機#鏡頭，引申代指裝咗依類鏡頭嘅相機（量詞：支／碌） (a relatively wide-angle lens; by extension, can refer to any camera with such a lens installed)
#作大 嘅説話 (untrue brags; embellished boastings)

examples.text: #車大炮
examples.jyutping: ce1 daai6 paau3
examples.translation: to brag; to boast; to lie in an exaggerated way about one's ability or achievement

senses.definition: 以對方為競爭對手、目標，直接咁挑戰對方 (to play against; to be an opponent of)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我估唔到第一場比賽就要同師兄打對台。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gu2 m4 dou3 dai6 jat1 coeng4 bei2 coi3 zau6 jiu3 tung4 si1 hing1 daa2 deoi3 toi4
examples.translation: I didn't expect to play against my senior in the first game.

senses.definition: 響對比之下，增強一樣嘢予人嘅印象 (to highlight; to stress; to emphasize by comparison)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今次意外突顯咗平時安全措施嘅不足。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 ji3 ngoi6 dat6 hin2 zo2 ping4 si4 on1 cyun4 cou3 si1 ge3 bat1 zuk1.
examples.translation: This accident has highlighted the loopholes in our safety protocol.

senses.definition: 一片有相同特質嘅土地，如以業權、街道、收入劃分（量詞：個） (an area or section of land with specific attributes, such as ownership, address number, or population income)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 半山屬於豪宅地段。
examples.jyutping: bun3 saan1 suk6 jyu1 hou4 zaak2 dei6 dyun6.
examples.translation: The mid-levels in HK is an area with very expensive apartments.

senses.definition: #古典；#優雅 (classic; elegant; graceful)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 新娘裝扮得非常典雅。
examples.jyutping: san1 noeng4 zong1 baan6 dak1 fei1 soeng4 din2 ngaa5.
examples.translation: The bride is dressed with classic elegance.

senses.definition: 搞笑；得意；過癮 (fun; interesting; amusing)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢單新聞好頂癮呀！
examples.jyutping: ni1 daan1 san1 man2 hou2 ding2 jan5 aa3!
examples.translation: This piece of news is so funny that it hurts my sides.

senses.definition: 睇#調頭 ；轉身 (to turn around)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿晴好驚狗，一見到狗就會掉轉頭走。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cing4 hou2 geng1 gau2, jat1 gin3 dou2 gau2 zau6 wui5 diu6 zyun3 tau4 zau2.
examples.translation: A-ching is afraid of dogs. She'll turn around and leave as soon as she sees a dog.

senses.definition: 顛倒是非；突然轉換立場 (to talk black into white; to change one's stance immediately)

examples.text: 係你失信在先，你竟然掉轉頭鬧我唔包容你？
examples.jyutping: hai6 nei5 sat1 seon3 zoi6 sin1, nei5 ging2 jin4 diu6 zyun3 tau4 naau6 ngo5 m4 baau1 jung4 nei5?
examples.translation: You broke your promise. How can you blame me for not forgiving you?

senses.definition: 通向成功嘅手段 （量詞：塊） (stepping-stone (used both literally and figuratively))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 嗰個有錢女？我當佢係踏腳石咋，唔會同佢結婚。
examples.jyutping: go2 go3 jau5 cin2 neoi5? ngo5 dong3 keoi5 hai6 daap6 goek3 sek6 zaa3, m4 wui5 tung4 keoi5 git3 fan1.
examples.translation: That wealthy woman is nothing more than a stepping-stone to me. I'm not marrying her.

senses.definition: 請人（通常係陌生人）俾你搭佢架車載你去到目的地 (to hitchhike; to ask someone(usually stranger) to give you a ride)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 女仔自己一個人搭順風車要小心啲。
examples.jyutping: neoi5 zai2 zi6 gei2 jat1 go3 jan4 daap3 seon6 fung1 ce1 jiu3 siu2 sam1 di1.
examples.translation: Girls who hitchhike on their own should be more careful.

senses.definition: 廉價嘅；低級，下等嘅；草根嘅；貼近基層生活嘅 (inexpensive, cheap; of low taste or grade; of grassroots class; earthy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 深水埗係窮人美食天堂，有好多地踎茶樓、大排檔、平價小食店。
examples.jyutping: sam1 seoi2 bou2 hai6 kung4 jan4 mei5 sik6 tin1 tong4, jau5 hou2 do1 dei6 mau1 caa4 lau4, daai6 paai4 dong3, peng4 gaa3 siu2 sik6 dim3.
examples.translation: Sham Shui Po is the gourmet heaven for the poor. There are a lot of grassroots teahouses, food stalls and greasy spoons.

senses.definition: 最下等，最貧窮嘅一種流氓，由於無固定地盤，連坐的位置也沒有，只能四處流連踎響地下休息，因而得名。 (the lowest class of rogue, have not even a still place to sit in, can only squat down here and there to rest temporarily.)

examples.text: 班地踎流氓好麻煩，成日騷擾行人。
examples.jyutping: baan1 dei6 mau1 lau4 man4 hou2 maa4 faan4, seng4 jat6 sou1 jiu2 hang4 jan4.
examples.translation: Those slummy rogues are so troublesome, they keep harassing the passer-by.

senses.definition: 維持一個地方或者物件於良好狀態 (to take care of (the maintenance of a place); to run chores)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 打理家頭細務
examples.jyutping: daa2 lei5 gaa1 tau4 sai3 mou6
examples.translation: to take care of household chores

senses.definition: 管理生意、公司、組織、團隊 (to manage; to be in charge of  (a business, a company, an organisation or a team))

examples.text: 佢幫佢爸爸打理間公司。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bong1 keoi5 baa4 baa1 daa2 lei5 gaan1 gung1 si1.
examples.translation: She managed the company for her father.

senses.definition: 遠離起居嘅地方去休息，放鬆心情 (to spend one's holidays or vacation elsewhere)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢喺墨西哥度緊假。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai2 mak6 sai1 go1 dou6 gan2 gaa3.
examples.translation: He's enjoying his vacation in Mexico.

senses.definition: 用啲其他嘢#補救#弱點、#缺陷 (to compensate; to make up for)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢唔係好聰明，不過佢就用勤力嚟搭夠。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 m4 hai6 hou2 cung1 ming4, bat1 gwo3 keoi5 zau6 jung6 kan4 lik6 lai4 daap3 gau3.
examples.translation: She's not pretty clever, but she works very hard to make up for it.

senses.definition: 裝飾同觀賞用嘅#燈，通常用嚟慶祝節日，增添氣氛 (holiday lights (especially Christmas lights); decorations made by light bulbs)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 睇燈飾
examples.jyutping: tai2 dang1 sik1
examples.translation: to enjoy watching holiday lights

senses.definition: 下一句可能會#激嬲、#冒犯 對方，講定呢四個字去避免激親 (no offense; with all due respect)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 得罪講句，你賺錢唔多，佢唔會鍾意你。
examples.jyutping: dak1 zeoi6 gong2 geoi3, nei5 zaan6 cin2 m4 do1, keoi5 m4 wui5 zung1 ji3 nei5.
examples.translation: No offense. You don't make a lot of money. She won't fall in love with you.

senses.definition: 好少嘅時間；短時間 (short-term)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 短期目標
examples.jyutping: dyun2 kei4 muk6 biu1
examples.translation: short-term goals

senses.definition: #梯級 狀嘅#輸送帶，可以將人由一層樓#運送 去另一層（量詞：部） (escalator)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #扶手電梯
examples.jyutping: fu4 sau2 din6 tai1
examples.translation: handrail escalator

senses.definition: #𨋢；#升降機 (lift; elevator)

examples.text: 電梯門
examples.jyutping: din6 tai1 mun4
examples.translation: lift doors

senses.definition: 地球嘅表面（量詞：塊） (ground; land; field)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #土地
examples.jyutping: tou2 dei6
examples.translation: land

senses.definition: 房間嘅底部，即係行入去對腳所掂住嘅平面（量詞：笪／地） (floor)

examples.text: #地板
examples.jyutping: dei6 baan2
examples.translation: floorboard

senses.definition: 行政區域 (place; locality; area)

examples.text: #地區
examples.jyutping: dei6 keoi1
examples.translation: region

senses.definition: 專門用嚟將適當嘅訊號還原成畫面同聲音，透過#螢幕 同#喇叭 播放嘅電器（量詞：部） (television (set); TV (set))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 而家啲電視機越出越薄。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 di1 din6 si6 gei1 jyut6 ceot1 jyut6 bok6.
examples.translation: The television sets nowadays are getting slimmer and slimmer.

senses.definition: 將調咗味嘅食材直接加水或湯汁，先用大火煲滾，再以小火慢煮，等到食材軟熟入味為止 (to simmer by bringing to a boil on high heat, then finishing on a slow flame)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 意大利燉飯
examples.jyutping: ji3 daai6 lei6 dan6 faan6
examples.translation: risotto

senses.definition: 隔水燉：內鍋放調咗味嘅食材同埋水或湯汁，而外鍋放入水，然後冚實鍋蓋，以中細火長時間烹煮，通常都係去料理易碎嘅食材 (to cook in a water-bath or double boiler for a long time, typically used when there are fragile ingredients. Similar to bain-marie (except the inner boiler is normally covered to avoid the extra water from the steam))

examples.text: 燉燕窩
examples.jyutping: dan6 jin3 wo1
examples.translation: bird's nest soup

senses.definition: 燉煮：長時間以慢火烹煮 (to stew; to cook on low heat for a long duration; to cook in a casserole)

examples.text: 啲湯最少要燉三個鐘頭㗎。
examples.jyutping: di1 tong1 zeoi3 siu2 jiu3 dan6 saam1 go3 zung1 tau4 gaa3.
examples.translation: It takes at least three hours of stewing before the soup is done.

senses.definition: 尺碼；體積比較大嘅尺寸，通常講#衫褲鞋襪 (large size; usually refers to clothes)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢着開大碼衫。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zoek3 hoi1 daai6 maa5 saam1.
examples.translation: He usually wears large size clothes.

senses.definition: 由公民選出，喺立法、審議機關代表公民行使政治權利嘅公職人員（量詞：個） (an elected representative, eg. legislator, lawmaker, councillor, etc.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 如果你真係畀大家一人一票揀心儀代議士嘅，就唔使叫人含淚投票啦。
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 nei5 zan1 hai6 bei2 daai6 gaa1 jat1 jan4 jat1 piu3 gaan2 sam1 ji4 doi6 ji5 si6 ge3, zau6 m4 sai2 giu3 jan4 ham4 leoi6 tau4 piu3 laa1.
examples.translation: If you really suggest everyone could cast their own vote for candidates they prefer and elect them representatives, you won't bother to ask people to vote for you even they are reluctant.

senses.definition: #粵劇 名伶；粵劇界入邊獨當一面嘅演員（量詞：個） (a Cantonese opera star, diva or divo)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個大老倌月入夠我用成年。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 daai6 lou5 gun1 jyut6 jap6 gau3 ngo5 jung6 seng4 nin4.
examples.translation: The monthly income of this diva is enough for me to live through an entire year.

senses.definition: 寄望上天懲治壞人 (phrase expressing a desire to see a bad person getting their dues or reaping what they sow)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢個無良老闆咁樣壓榨員工，等天收啦！
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 mou4 loeng4 lou5 baan2 gam2 joeng2 aat3 zaa3 jyun4 gung1, dang2 tin1 sau1 laa1!
examples.translation: That heartless boss keeps exploiting his employees; I hope to see the day when he finally reaps what he has sown.

senses.definition: 烘過嘅#麪包，尤其係烘過嘅#方包（量詞：塊／片／件） (toast; bread that is exposed to heat)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 早餐淨係食一片多士係唔夠㗎。
examples.jyutping: zou2 caan1 zing6 hai6 sik6 jat1 pin3 do1 si2 hai6 m4 gau3 gaa3.
examples.translation: It's not enough to just eat toast for breakfast.

senses.definition: 將啲有相當數量嘅嘢儲存埋一齊 (to stack; to pile up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 間工廠堆放咗好多易燃物品喺度。
examples.jyutping: gaan1 gung1 cong2 deoi1 fong3 zo2 hou2 do1 ji6 jin4 mat6 ban2 hai2 dou6.
examples.translation: The factory was piled with a lot of inflammable goods.

senses.definition: #地面嘅#起伏 (terrain)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個係典型嘅山區地形，有懸崖，有山谷。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 hai6 din2 jing4 ge3 saan1 keoi1 dei6 jing4, jau5 jyun4 ngaai4, jau5 saan1 guk1.
examples.translation: This is typical mountainous terrain; there are peaks and valleys.

senses.definition: 打敗；推翻 (to overthrow; to defeat; "down with")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋一定要打倒暴政！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 jat1 ding6 jiu3 daa2 dou2 bou6 zing3!
examples.translation: We must overthrow the tyranny!

senses.definition: 繩狀嘅嘢由高處垂下 (to hang; to attach sth at the top so that the lower part is free or loose)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢哋喺樹度髧咗條繩落嚟。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 hai2 syu6 dou6 dam3 zo2 tiu4 sing2 lok6 lai4.
examples.translation: They hung down a rope from the tree.

senses.definition: 形容女性#乳房 下垂 (a vulgar expression of saggy breasts)

examples.text: 波髧髧
examples.jyutping: bo1 dam3 dam3
examples.translation: to have sagging breasts

senses.definition: 插口加入其他人嘅對話 (to break into a conversation; to interrupt or interject into a conversation. Literally: extra mouth)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 人地傾緊重要嘢，咪走嚟搭嘴啦！
examples.jyutping: jan4 dei6 king1 gan2 zung6 jiu3 je5, mai5 zau2 lai4 daap3 zeoi2 laa1!
examples.translation: We are discussing important issues. Don't break into our conversation!

senses.definition: 大灑資金 (to heavily spend money)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 抌本宣傳
examples.jyutping: dam2 bun2 syun1 cyun4
examples.translation: to promote at high cost

senses.definition: 勇氣；遇到難關或未知情況都唔會驚嘅能力 (guts; courage; spunk)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 有膽量嘅人先至可以參加呢個遊戲。
examples.jyutping: jau5 daam2 loeng6 ge3 jan4 sin1 zi3 ho2 ji5 caam1 gaa1 ni1 go3 jau4 hei3.
examples.translation: Only those with courage can join this game.

senses.definition: 吹水，傾計 (to have chit-chat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 喂！咁耐冇見，嗲幾句先啦！
examples.jyutping: wai3! gam3 noi6 mou5 gin3, de1 gei2 geoi3 sin1 laa1!
examples.translation: Hey! Long time no see, let's have some chit-chat!

senses.definition: 切換位置 (to change position)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋會調多啲人手嚟幫你。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 wui5 diu6 do1 di1 jan4 sau2 lei4 bong1 nei5.
examples.translation: We will send more people (from other departments) to help you out.

senses.definition: #對調；互換 (to swap; to exchange)

examples.text: 你抽到嗰份禮物正啲，不如我同你調吖。
examples.jyutping: nei5 cau1 dou2 go2 fan6 lai5 mat6 zeng3 di1, bat1 jyu4 ngo5 tung4 nei5 diu6 aa1.
examples.translation: The gift you won from the lucky draw is better. May I swap mine with yours?

senses.definition: 同其他人／物比較之下嘅身份（量詞：個） (status; position; standing)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 社會地位
examples.jyutping: se5 wui2 dei6 wai6
examples.translation: social status

senses.definition: 響比賽度勝出；攞金牌 (to win the championship; to take the trophy)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢希望能夠喺今屆運動會上奪標。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hei1 mong6 nang4 gau3 hai2 gam1 gaai3 wan6 dung6 wui2 soeng6 dyut6 biu1.
examples.translation: He hopes to take the gold of this tournament

senses.definition: #保證；表示同人透露非常有信心將會做到一件事，可以獲得對方對呢點嘅信任 (to guarantee; to promise)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我打包單保證我聽朝做完份計劃書。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 daa2 baau1 daan1 bou2 zing3 ngo5 ting1 ziu1 zou6 jyun4 fan6 gai3 waak6 syu1.
examples.translation: I promise I will finish this proposal by the next morning.

senses.definition: 價值下降 (to depreciate, (of the price of an item) to fall)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你間屋跌咗價喎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gaan1 uk1 dit3 zo2 gaa3 wo3.
examples.translation: Your house is now less valuable than before.

senses.definition: 伙伴、同伴；合作者、合伙人 (partner; companion)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我識咗佢十幾年喇，我地係生意上嘅好搭檔嚟。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 sik1 zo2 keoi5 sap6 gei2 nin4 laa3, ngo5 dei6 hai6 saang1 ji3 soeng6 ge3 hou2 daap3 dong3 lai4.
examples.translation: I have known him for years, we are good business partner.

senses.definition: 做啲不必要嘅動作，冇嘢揾嘢嚟搞 (to perform any unnecessary task)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 啱啱出面先落完雨仲使淋花？咪多此一舉啦。
examples.jyutping: ngaam1 ngaam1 ceot1 min6 sin1 lok6 jyun4 jyu5 zung6 sai2 lam4 faa1? mai5 do1 ci2 jat1 geoi2 laa1.
examples.translation: I don't see the need of watering the garden after the rain. Don't waste time on unnecessary tasks.

senses.definition: 響一個商品推出零售市場之前預先留約 (to place an order for something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 網上訂購書籍
examples.jyutping: mong5 soeng6 deng6 kau3 syu1 zik6
examples.translation: to order books online

senses.definition: 同#訂購 (to place an order on a merchandise)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 賣家願意出嘅最低價格（量詞：個） (base price)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 拍賣底價
examples.jyutping: paak3 maai6 dai2 gaa3
examples.translation: auction reserve price

senses.definition: 淨係靠睇人哋講緊嘢嗰陣#嘴唇 以至#牙 同#脷 嘅動作，解讀內容 (to read lips; to understand what somebody is saying by observing the movement of the mouth and lips instead of relying on auditory senses)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 原來你唔只識讀唇，仲識讀心。
examples.jyutping: jyun4 loi4 nei5 m4 zi2 sik1 duk6 seon4, zung6 sik1 duk6 sam1.
examples.translation: I just knew that not only can you read lips but also minds.

senses.definition: 電子遊戲中嘅攻擊招式；可以同時打晒成個地圖上嘅嘢，甚至係自己人都照打，攻擊力非常高 (a 'global' attack in video games, usually capable of massive damage, even to friendlies)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 隻嘢一個地圖炮車埋嚟就全隊死晒喇。
examples.jyutping: zek3 je5 jat1 go3 dei6 tou4 paau3 ce1 maai4 lai4 zau6 cyun4 deoi6 sei2 saai3 laa3.
examples.translation: The creature wiped out the whole team with a single global attack.

senses.definition: 由遊戲嘅用法引伸出嚟，指批評、攻擊一啲好廣泛或者好多人都會做嘅嘢，就好似「地圖炮」咁一次過攻擊好多人 (to make a vague or generalized criticism or attack, that could be applied to many individuals)

examples.text: 佢咁樣開地圖炮，連自己啲黨友都鬧埋都唔知。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam2 joeng2 hoi1 dei6 tou4 paau3, lin4 zi6 gei2 di1 dong2 jau5 dou1 naau6 maai4 dou1 ng4 zi1.
examples.translation: He wasn't even aware of the fact that the same could be said of his fellow party members with regard to his blanket criticisms.

senses.definition: （足球、籃球之類球員可以持球移動嘅球類運動）球員移動嗰陣令個波控制喺自己周圍 ((of ballgames such as football and basketball) to do dribbling (i.e. moving while keeping the ball by one's side))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個球員可以好黐腳噉帶波，好厲害。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 kau4 jyun4 ho2 ji5 hou2 ci1 goek3 gam2 daai3 bo1, hou2 lai6 hoi6.
examples.translation: This player can keep the ball very closely to his feet while dribbling, brilliant.

senses.definition: 打錯電話 (to dial a wrong number; to reach a wrong number)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔好意思，搭錯線。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 ji3 si1, daap3 co3 sin3.
examples.translation: Sorry, I've got the wrong number.

senses.definition: 同人傾偈時九唔搭八，講咗另一個話題 (to be on a wrong or irrelevant topic in a conversation)

examples.text: 你係咪搭錯線啊？我哋都唔係講緊呢樣嘢。
examples.jyutping: nei5 hai6 mai6 daap3 co3 sin3 aa3? ngo5 dei6 dou1 m4 hai6 gong2 gan2 ni1 joeng6 je5.
examples.translation: Are you sure you're with us? We aren't talking about that right now.

senses.definition: 事物嘅品質差；做嘢嘅方式差 (of poor quality; despicable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 啲酒質素咁低劣就咪鬼飲啦，傷身㗎！
examples.jyutping: di1 zau2 zat1 sou3 gam3 dai1 lyut6 zau6 mai5 gwai2 jam2 laa1, soeng1 san1 gaa3!
examples.translation: Get rid of this sort of cheap liquor, which is quite harmful to your health.

senses.definition: 一種先天嘅腦部缺陷，患者一般未能快而準咁認、讀同寫字 (dyslexia)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿諾有讀寫障礙，寫字嗰陣成日將隻字倒轉咗嚟寫。
examples.jyutping: aa3 nok6 jau5 duk6 se2 zoeng3 ngoi6, se2 zi6 go2 zan6 seng4 jat6 zoeng1 zek3 zi6 dou3 zyun3 zo2 lei4 se2.
examples.translation: Arnold suffers from dyslexia, so he often writes the letter upside down.

senses.definition: 破壞咗某啲嘢，超越咗舊有嘅嘢 (to break; to smash)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 打破僵局
examples.jyutping: daa2 po3 goeng1 guk6
examples.translation: to break a deadlock

senses.definition: 齋講唔做 (to boast what one is going to do but never really put it into action)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔好指意佢呀，佢成日都係大隻講㗎咋。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 zi2 ji3 keoi5 aa3, keoi5 seng4 jat6 dou1 hai6 daai6 zek3 gong2 gaa3 zaa3.
examples.translation: Don't rely on him; he only ever talks the talk, but never walks the walk.

senses.definition: 泛指所有年紀同性別嘅人 (people of all ages and both sexes)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢條村大細老嫩有成千人。
examples.jyutping: ni1 tiu4 cyun1 daai6 sai3 lou5 nyun6 jau5 sing4 cin1 jan4.
examples.translation: There are up to a thousand people in total in this village, regardless of age and gender.

senses.definition: 演員嘅陣容鼎盛 (an all-star cast; literally: big cast)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢套戲好大卡士。
examples.jyutping: ni1 tou3 hei3 hou2 daai6 kaa1 si2.
examples.translation: The movie has an all-star cast.

senses.definition: 可供發展嘅土地 （量詞:幅） (land esp. for building)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 政府已經賣咗呢幅地皮俾發展商喇。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 ji5 ging1 maai6 zo2 ni1 fuk1 dei6 pei4 bei2 faat3 zin2 soeng1 laa3.
examples.translation: The land has been sold to the developers by the government.

senses.definition: 好#熱門、好#流行 (very popular; very fashionable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢首歌今期大熱。
examples.jyutping: ni1 sau2 go1 gam1 kei4 daai6 jit6.
examples.translation: This song is super popular right now.

senses.definition: #大規模 (large scale)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個傳銷騙局好大單，夾埋呃咗成幾十億。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 cyun4 siu1 pin3 guk6 hou2 daai6 daan1, gaap3 maai4 ngaak1 zo2 seng4 gei2 sap6 jik1.
examples.translation: This Ponzi scheme reached a very large scale, estimated at a loss of up to billions.

senses.definition: 闖大禍；出事 (being in serious trouble; having something serious happened)

examples.text: 佢醉駕撞到路人，所以今次佢大單啦！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zeoi3 gaa3 zong6 dou3 lou6 jan4, so2 ji5 gam1 ci3 keoi5 daai6 daan1 laa1!
examples.translation: He ran into a passenger after drink driving, so he is in serious trouble this time!

senses.definition: 用嚟提問，意思係用咩方式、有咩情形、有咩目的 (how; in what way; in what manner)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.text: 郵局點去㗎？
examples.jyutping: jau4 guk6 dim2 heoi3 gaa3?
examples.translation: How can I get to the post office?

senses.definition: 表面上係用嚟提問，實際上責怪某人喺某件事做得唔好 (ostensibly asking how something is done, but in fact used to express annoyance at how it is done incompetently)

examples.text: 有冇搞錯，你哋點做生意㗎？
examples.jyutping: jau5 mou5 gaau2 co3, nei5 dei6 dim2 zou6 saang1 ji3 gaa3?
examples.translation: Are you kidding me? How on earth can you do business like this?

senses.definition: 喺條件句入面，用嚟代替情況或者做事手法，通常同「#就」「#咪」一齊用 (whatever; however; used in conditionals to substitute a situation, a method, or some way of doing things)

examples.text: 應該點做就點做，唔使問我㗎嘞。
examples.jyutping: jing1 goi1 dim2 zou6 zau6 dim2 zou6, m4 sai2 man6 ngo5 gaa3 laak3.
examples.translation: Do it the way it should be done, you don't need to ask me.

senses.definition: 唔好彩；運氣唔好 (to be unlucky)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢排都唔知係咪當黑，成日講嘢咬到條脷。
examples.jyutping: ni1 paai2 dou1 m4 zi1 hai6 mai6 dong1 hak1, seng4 jat6 gong2 je5 ngaau5 dou2 tiu4 lei6.
examples.translation: I have some really rotten luck lately, always biting my tongue whilst talking.

senses.definition: 形容一啲惡毒嘅嘢，對其他人造成傷害 (malicious)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 心腸歹毒
examples.translation: malicious at heart

senses.definition: 形容一樣嘢盛大、興旺，發展到極致 (to be at the pinnacle of; to be bustling with)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 鼎盛時期
examples.jyutping: ding2 sing6 si4 kei4
examples.translation: at the pinnncale of

senses.definition: 大規模、重要嘅#選舉（量詞：次／場／輪） (general election)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 總統大選
examples.jyutping: zung2 tung2 daai6 syun2
examples.translation: presidential election

senses.definition: 將水由某容器倒走 (to pour water from a container)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 比喻落大水 (metaphor for heavy rain)

examples.text: 出面落大雨好似倒水噉。
examples.translation: The rain is pouring outside.

senses.definition: 比喻用電用得快，電池好快冇電 (metaphor for quick depletion of batteries)

examples.text: 我部電話嚿電倒水噉倒，係時候換過部新機。
examples.translation: The battery of my phone is depleted like pouring water, it's time for a new phone.

senses.definition: 比喻使錢使得好快 (metaphor for quickly spending a lot of money)

examples.text: 而家物價指數咁高，飲下野、睇場戲，啲錢倒水噉倒。
examples.translation: Prices of everything is so high. A cup of coffee, a cinema ticket, and money is poured out like water.

senses.definition: 用強硬嘅手段撳低、壓制住 (to suppress; to repress; to crack down)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 打壓言論自由
examples.jyutping: daa2 aat3 jin4 leon6 zi6 jau4
examples.translation: speech suppression

senses.definition: #插手 理其他人嘅事，但其實佢根本唔需要 (to meddle in someone's affairs)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢心中有數，邊使我哋多管閒事喎。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 sam1 zung1 jau5 sou3, bin1 sai2 ngo5 dei6 do1 gun2 haan4 si6 wo3.
examples.translation: He knows what he's doing. We need not meddle in his affairs.

senses.definition: 失敗之後重新開始，回復返昔日嘅成就 (to rise or recover from failure)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢破產之後東山再起，而家又開番間廠。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 po3 caan2 zi1 hau6 dung1 saan1 zoi3 hei2, ji4 gaa1 jau6 hoi1 faan1 gaan1 cong2.
examples.translation: He rises from the ashes of bankruptcy and build a factory yet again.

senses.definition: 量度大氣層嘅氣壓單位，一大氣壓係#地球#海平面 嘅平均氣壓，等於 101325 Pa，符號 atm (atmospheric pressure; air pressure)
senses.label: 量詞

senses.definition: 量度嘅標準，例如公斤、厘米等 (unit of measurement)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 厘米係量度長度嘅單位。
examples.jyutping: lei4 mai5 hai6 loeng4 dok6 coeng4 dou6 ge3 daan1 wai2.
examples.translation: Centimetre is a unit of measurement for measuring length.

senses.definition: 大廈入面嘅房間（量詞：個） (apartment; flat)

examples.text: 我喺呢座大廈度買咗兩個單位。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hai2 ni1 zo6 daai6 haa6 dou6 maai5 zo2 loeng5 go3 daan1 wai2.
examples.translation: I bought two flats in this building.

senses.definition: 保持住唔作任何行動嘅狀態，但隨時可以準備行動 (to standby)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我轉咗部電腦做待機狀態，你想用嘅話可以隨時用。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zyun2 zo2 bou6 din6 nou5 zou6 doi6 gei1 zong6 taai3, nei5 soeng2 jung6 ge3 waa6 ho2 ji5 ceoi4 si4 jung6.
examples.translation: If I put my computer on standby mode, you can use it anytime if you want to.

phonetic.original: daan6 gaa1 po4 mo2 hin2:dang6 gaa1 po4 mo2 hin2

senses.definition: 歇後語，後一句係「第二篩」，意思係冇希望，係「#第世」「#下世」 (to have given up hope, to have only hope for the next life, to have no hope (a sandwich pun which literally means "Tanka boatwoman gropes for clams", which is followed by the phrase 第篩 dai6 sai1 (another sieve); which puns with 第世 dai6 sai3 (second life) ))
senses.label: 語句

keywords: daan6 gaa1 po4 mo2 hin2:dang6 gaa1 po4 mo2 hin2

senses.definition: 操粵語嘅水上人（#蜑家 人）講嘅方言 (Tanka dialect of Cantonese)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 分佈喺#福建、#廣東 一帶嘅#漁民，喺漁船上面起居生活；部份人覺得稱謂含貶義，會有所冒犯 (Tanka people; boat people (Note: Some may find this address derogatory and thus offensive.))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用嚟識別同接駁唔同#電話 嘅數字（量詞：個） (telephone number)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你嘅電話號碼幾多號呀？
examples.jyutping: nei5 ge3 din6 waa2 hou6 maa5 gei2 do1 hou6 aa3?
examples.translation: What is your telephone number?

senses.definition: 出於#憐憫 之心，#寬容 或幫助其他人，有時帶有諷刺或者開玩笑嘅意味 (to take pity on someone and show mercy to him/her)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢跪求佛祖大發慈悲，原諒佢嘅過錯。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gwai6 kau4 fat6 zou2 daai6 faat3 ci4 bei1, jyun4 loeng6 keoi5 ge3 gwo3 co3
examples.translation: He knelt down and begged for Buddha's mercy and forgiveness.

senses.definition: 面值比較大嘅紙幣；喺香港多數指五百蚊同一千蚊紙（量詞：張） (big banknotes; $500 and $1000 banknotes in Hong Kong)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我得大紙咋。唔好意思。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dak1 daai6 zi2 zaa3. m4 hou2 ji3 si3.
examples.translation: I've only got big banknotes. Sorry about it.

senses.definition: 面額大嘅#鈔票（#銀紙）；香港嚟講，指 500 蚊紙同 1000 蚊紙 (big banknotes; $500 and $1000 banknotes in Hong Kong)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 恕不接受千元大鈔
examples.jyutping: syu3 bat1 zip3 sau6 cin1 jyun4 daai6 caau1
examples.translation: Sorry we do not accept $1000 banknotes.

senses.definition: 指頭部特別是腦袋愚笨或思維緩慢的人 (a slang term that refers to someone who is slow-witted or has slow thinking)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一家公司將生產製造嘅設計內容交畀另一家公司負責加工製造，而唔係自己生產 (to outsource)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 比喻用智慧或手段將無用之物變成有用之物，或將不起眼之人變成有成就之人 (to turn something worthless into something valuable, or to turn an ordinary person into a successful one through intelligence or means)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢有將廢物點石成金嘅本事。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jau5 zoeng1 fai3 mat6 dim2 sek6 sing4 gam1 ge3 bun2 si6
examples.translation: He has the ability to turn trash into gold.

senses.definition: 主持屋企嘅事務，喺屋企裏面有相當嘅話事權 (to be in charge of a household; literally: to be the leader or to take on the role of a leader)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 當家作主
examples.jyutping: dong1 gaa1 zok3 zyu2
examples.translation: rule the roost

senses.definition: 特別嘅待遇；#優惠；#周邊 (privilege; special gift; bonus; periphery)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 預購嘅玩家可以獲得上述嘅特典。
examples.jyutping: jyu6 kau3 ge3 waan2 gaa1 ho2 ji5 wok6 dak1 soeng6 seot6 ge3 dak6 din2
examples.translation: Players who pre-order can get the bonus mentioned above.

senses.definition: #頂你個肺；抒發感情用嘅，多數都係情緒激動、嬲嘅時候講 (damn; shit)
senses.label: 感嘆詞

examples.text: 頂！部機又壞咗。
examples.jyutping: ding2! bou6 gei1 jau6 waai6 zo2.
examples.translation: Damn! The device is not working again.

senses.definition: 喺一個地方停留、停止做某件事、處喺準備狀態，直至另一件事發生 (to wait)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我等咗佢成晚喇，佢都冇出現。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dang2 zo2 keoi5 seng4 maan5 laa3, keoi5 dou1 mou5 ceot1 jin6.
examples.translation: I've been waiting her for the whole night. She never showed up.

senses.definition: 將啲嘢留低俾特定嘅人去做 (to leave a task to someone)

examples.text: 啲碗等我洗啦。
examples.jyutping: di1 wun2 dang2 ngo5 sai2 laa1.
examples.translation: Let me do the dishes.

senses.definition: 去到某個狀態嘅時候，要停止某樣活動 (to cease an activity upon reaching a certain state or condition; to pullback when necessary)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 做任何事都唔好過度，記得要點到即止
examples.jyutping: zou6 jam6 ho4 si6 dou1 m4 hou2 gwo3 dou6, gei3 dak1 jiu3 dim2 dou3 zik1 zi2
examples.translation: Don't overdo anything. Remember to stop when you've had enough.

senses.definition: #還是；#定係 (or; either...or)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 究竟係我睇錯，定還是你真係喺度寫辭職信？
examples.jyutping: gau3 ging2 hai6 ngo5 tai2 co3, ding6 waan4 si6 nei5 zan1 hai6 hai2 dou6 se2 ci4 zik1 seon3
examples.translation: Is it me reading it wrong or is it you writing the resignation letter?

senses.definition: 被當場#踢爆 自己做錯嘅嘢，或者冇做到自己講過嘅嘢，所以覺得#丟架、落唔到台 (to have eggs on one's face)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 希望你之後唔好被人瘋狂打臉。
examples.jyutping: hei1 mong6 nei5 zi1 hau6 m4 hou2 bei6 jan4 fung1 kong4 daa2 lim5
examples.translation: I hope you won't end up with eggs on your face.

senses.definition: 進入 (to step into; to enter)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 踏入社會之後，佢好似變左個人咁。
examples.jyutping: daap6 jap6 se5 wui5 zi1 hau6, keoi5 hou2 ci5 bin3 zo2 go3 jan4 gam2
examples.translation: She acts like another person after stepping into society.

senses.definition: 用嚟#代替 另一樣事物或者人嘅物品 (substitute)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 環保袋係膠袋嘅代替品。
examples.jyutping: waan4 bou2 doi2 hai6 gaau1 doi2 ge3 doi6 tai3 ban2
examples.translation: Reusable bags can be used as a substitute for plastic bags.

senses.definition: 擁有同等嘅價值 (of same value)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.text: 等價交換
examples.jyutping: dang2 gaa3 gaau1 wun6
examples.translation: a fair deal

senses.definition: 喺需要嘅時候起極大作用 (to come in handy)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 終於到我大派用場嘅時候喇！
examples.jyutping: zung1 jyu1 dou3 ngo5 daai6 paai3 jung6 coeng4 ge3 si4 hau6 laa3
examples.translation: It's finally time for me to come in handy!

senses.definition: #地球 嘅 #表面 (the Earth's surface)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 地表覆蓋
examples.jyutping: dei6 biu2 fuk1 koi3
examples.translation: land cover

senses.definition: #世界上 (the world)

examples.text: 今次嘅隊伍可以話係地表最強！
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 ge3 deoi6 ng5 ho2 ji5 waa6 hai6 dei6 biu2 zeoi3 koeng4
examples.translation: It could be said as the strongest team in the world!

senses.definition: 將自己代入某個人嘅角色，有#感同身受 嘅感覺 (vicariousness)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢部電影令觀眾產生好強嘅代入感。
examples.jyutping: ni1 bou6 din6 jing2 ling6 gun1 zung3 caan2 sang1 hou2 koeng4 ge3 doi6 jap6 gam2
examples.translation: The movie has provided the audience with a feeling of intense vicariousness.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
啱同埋唔啱 (right or wrong)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢件事冇對錯之分，只係大家立場唔同，睇問題嘅角度亦都唔同。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gin6 si6 mou5 deoi3 co3 zi1 fan1, zi2 hai6 daai6 gaa1 laap6 coeng4 m4 tung4, tai2 man6 tai4 ge3 gok3 dou6 jik6 dou1 m4 tung4
examples.translation: There is no right or wrong in this matter. It's just that everyone has their own standpoint and they see the problem from different angles.

senses.definition: 抵抗其他嘢或者人嘅力量 (resistibility, the ability to resist)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢對美食一啲抵抗力都冇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 deoi3 mei5 sik6 jat1 di1 dai2 kong3 lik6 dou1 mou5
examples.translation: Gourmet food is irresistible to him.

senses.definition: #免疫力 (immunity)

examples.text: 呢隻奶粉聲稱可以提高BB嘅抵抗力。
examples.jyutping: ni1 zek3 naai5 fan2 sing1 cing1 ho2 ji5 tai4 gou1 BB ge3 dai2 kong3 lik6
examples.translation: This powdered milk is claimed to be effective in strengthening the baby's immunity.

senses.definition: 形容突然從門口出去（通常指逃跑或離開） (to rush out of the door suddenly (usually implying escape or departure))
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢覺得好瘀，就跑咗出去。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gok3 dak1 hou2 jyu2, zau6 paau2 zo2 ceot1 heoi3
examples.translation: She feels embarrassed and rushes out of the door.

senses.definition: 打到某個化為人形嘅妖怪變返本來嘅形態 (to attack and force a shapeshifter, especially a humanoid creature, to reveal its original shape)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 孫悟空將白骨精打回原形。
examples.jyutping: syun1 ng6 hung1 zoeng1 baak6 gwat1 zing1 daa2 wui4 jyun4 jing4
examples.translation: The Monkey King has beaten the White Bone Demon to its original form.

senses.definition: 變返本來咁樣，恢復原有嘅樣子 (to relapse into one's old ways; to revert to normal)

examples.text: 佢應承得好好地，但冇過幾日就打回原形。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jing1 sing4 dak1 hou2 hou2 dei2, daan6 mou5 gwo3 gei2 jat6 zau6 daa2 wui4 jyun4 jing4
examples.translation: He promised to change, yet he slipped back to his old ways in just a few days.

senses.definition: #由，以某個時間點作為起點 (since; from)
senses.label: 介詞

examples.text: 打從心底
examples.jyutping: daa2 cung4 sam1 dai2
examples.translation: from the bottom of my heart

senses.definition: 無論大定係細，即係囊括所有嘅意思 (no matter how big or small; all)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 屋企大大小小嘅事都係由佢去處理。
examples.jyutping: uk1 kei2 daai6 daai6 siu2 siu2 ge3 si6 dou1 hai6 jau4 keoi5 heoi3 cyu5 lei5
examples.translation: He handles all the household chores, no matter how big or small.

senses.definition: 唔小心令液體係唔受控制嘅情況下從容器中倒出 (spill)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢唔小心倒瀉咗杯可樂
examples.jyutping: keoi5 m4 siu2 sam1 dou2 se3 zo2 bui1 ho2 lok6
examples.translation: He accidentally spilled his cup of Coke.

senses.definition: 執掌政權 (to come into power; to hold public office; to be in office)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 當政者
examples.jyutping: dong1 zing3 ze2
examples.translation: the executive

senses.definition: 承擔責任、負責崗位 (to be responsible for; to bear the responsibility)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個責任我擔當唔起。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 zaak3 jam6 ngo5 daam1 dong1 m4 hei2.
examples.translation: I can't bear this responsibility.

senses.definition: 擔任某個角色 (to play a role (in something))

examples.text: 唔好以為自己冇用，其實你擔當緊好重要嘅角色。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 ji5 wai4 zi6 gei2 mou5 jung6, kei4 sat6 nei5 daam1 dong1 gan2 hou2 zung6 jiu3 ge3 gok3 sik1
examples.translation: Don't assume you're useless. You actually have an important role to play.

senses.definition: 整理同安排事務 (to arrange or organize affairs or tasks)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你就嚟要去旅行，要開始打點一下啲行李喇。
examples.jyutping: nei5 zau6 lai4 jiu3 heoi3 leoi5 hang4 jiu3 hoi1 ci2 daa2 dim2 jat1 haa5 di1 hang4 lei5 laa3
examples.translation: You are going on a trip and you should pack your stuff now.

senses.definition: 利用金錢或利益賄賂、請託有權力嘅人，打通關節，令自己或者其他人有好嘅前途 (to bribe)

examples.text: 為咗令個仔有好嘅前途，佢用咗好多錢去上下打點。
examples.jyutping: wai6 zo2 ling6 go3 zai2 jau5 hou2 ge3 cin4 tou4 keoi5 jung6 zo2 hou2 do1 cin2 heoi3 soeng6 haa6 daa2 dim2
examples.translation: He spent a large fortune to bribe his son's superiors in order to pave the way for him.

senses.definition: 專注於一種或幾種癖好，冇乜異性緣，唔擅長社交，冇乜自信；通常帶貶義。 (nerdy; geeky; lacking confidence and social skills)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 咪成日打機咁毒啦。
examples.jyutping: mai5 seng4 jat6 daa2 gei1 gam3 duk6 laa1.
examples.translation: Stop playing video games all day like a geek.

senses.definition: 起喺地底嘅房或者空間（量詞：個／間） (cellar)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 順住呢條地道一直行，就會到達地下室。
examples.jyutping: seon6 zyu6 ni1 tiu4 dei6 dou6 jat1 zik6 haang4, zau6 wui5 dou3 daat6 dei6 haa6 sat1
examples.translation: Walk along this tunnel and you will reach the cellar.

senses.definition: 致命，非常危險 (fatal, deadly)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 近日，天水圍發生一宗奪命車禍，造成多人死傷。
examples.jyutping: gan6 jat6 tin1 seoi2 wai4 faat3 sang1 jat1 zung1 dyut6 ming6 ce1 wo6 zou6 sing4 do1 jan4 sei2 soeng1
examples.translation: Recently, casualties are caused in a fatal car accident in Tin Shui Wai.

senses.definition: 突然領悟 (to suddenly realise or understand)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢場意外令佢頓悟生命嘅可貴之處。
examples.jyutping: ni1 coeng4 ji3 ngoi6 ling6 keoi5 deon6 ng6 sang1 ming6 ge3 ho2 gwai3 zi1 cyu3
examples.translation: This accident made her suddenly realize the value of life.

senses.definition: 責任心 (sense of responsibility)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你呢個人咁冇擔當嘅。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ni1 go3 jan4 gam3 mou5 daam1 dong1 ge3
examples.translation: You are so irresponsible.

senses.definition: 一對一 (one on one)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 單對單見面
examples.jyutping: daan1 deoi3 daan1 gin3 min6
examples.translation: one-on-one meeting

senses.definition: 降低自己身份去#懇求 (to be meek and subservient)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 鬼叫你做錯咩，係要低聲下氣去求佢原諒㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: gwai2 giu3 nei5 zou6 co3 me1, hai6 jiu3 dai1 seng1 haa6 hei3 heoi3 kau4 keoi5 jyun4 loeng6 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: You were wrong, so just keep your head down and apologize.

senses.definition: 令兩邊（數量、能力等）接近 (to strike a balance; to make things even on the two sides)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你勁咁多，不如戥返勻，你加個新手對我哋三個啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ging6 gam3 do1, bat1 jyu4 dang6 faan1 wan4, nei5 gaa1 go3 san1 sau2 deoi3 ngo5 dei6 saam1 go3 laa1.
examples.translation: You are way better than us. Why don't we strike a balance? You can make a team with another newbie to play against us three.

senses.definition: 好大規模噉 (massively; in a large scale)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 大舉進攻
examples.jyutping: daai6 geoi2 zeon3 gung1
examples.translation: massive attack

senses.definition: 雙方僵持於現況，不分上下 (to confront each other; to have a standoff)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 劫匪劫持人質同警方對峙。
examples.jyutping: gip3 fei2 gip3 ci4 jan4 zi3 tung4 ging2 fong1 deoi3 zi6.
examples.translation: The robbers have taken hostages and have a standoff with the police.

senses.definition: 喺呢一刻、呢一步終止 (stop here; end here; this is the end of (something))
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我哋已經有結論喇，呢個會就到此為止啦。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 ji5 ging1 jau5 git3 leon6 laa3, ni1 go3 wui2 zau6 dou3 ci2 wai4 zi2 laa1.
examples.translation: We have come to the conclusion in the meeting. Let's call it a day.

senses.definition: 利用時間 (to spend; to pass)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個聖誕假期你打算點樣度過啊？
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 sing3 daan3 gaa3 kei4 nei5 daa2 syun3 dim2 joeng2 dou6 gwo3 aa3?
examples.translation: How are you going to spend your Christmas holidays?

senses.definition: 目不轉睛噉望住 (to stare at)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個男仔盯住你喎，係咪想溝你呀？
examples.jyutping: go3 naam4 zai2 ding1 zyu6 nei5 wo3, hai6 mai6 soeng2 kau1 nei5 aa3?
examples.translation: The boy is staring at you. You think he wants to chase you?

senses.definition: 指上天，華人傳統信仰有敬拜天地嘅儀式，凡開業、開工、婚嫁等都會對天地祭獻，以求平安順利；常與#地主 ／#土地 合用 (the sky or Heaven; in the Ethnic Chinese's tradition, they worship the sky and earth when opening a business, beginning a project, or before a wedding, in hopes of safety and smooth sailing; often invoked in conjunction with Tou Dei (Guard/Owner of the Earth))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 拜當天
examples.jyutping: baai3 dong1 tin1
examples.translation: to worship the heavens

senses.definition: #當作；#認為 (to regard as; to take someone for (someone else))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我將佢當成你。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zoeng1 keoi5 dong1 sing4 nei5.
examples.translation: I have mistaken you for him.

senses.definition: 隻身一人或只有少數人陪同前往有危險嘅會面，比喻某人有智謀 (used to praise someone who is brave and wise. literally, to go to/attend a meeting on his own or accompanied with very few people.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 總統單刀赴會解決咗雙方嘅利益衝突。
examples.jyutping: zung2 tung2 daan1 dou1 fu6 wui6 gaai2 kyut3 zo2 soeng1 fong1 ge3 lei6 jik1 cung1 dat6.
examples.translation: The president attended the meeting on his own and solved the interest conflicts between two parties.

形容廣東社會之中，#冬至 重要過 #新年 (lit. Winter Solstice is more important than the New Year, which is a Cantonese tradition)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 指幫#大耳窿 揾人借錢嘅人，而家嘅正式名係「博彩中介人合作者」（量詞：個） (underlying of a loan-shark, someone who talks gamblers into borrowing money; stack-chip boy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個疊碼仔講兩講，佢就借咗五萬蚊繼續賭喇。
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]The gambler talked for a while and then borrowed another 50,000 dollars to continue gambling.

senses.definition: 長子；父母嘅頭一胎男 (eldest son)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 香港入學制度入面，指年頭出世（大約1-3月）嘅學童，而「#細仔」即是年尾出世。因為佢吔申請果年幼稚園同小一入學嘅資格要求係果該年12月31日前滿3歲。理論上1月出世嘅小朋友，9月入讀幼稚時已經3歲9個月大，而12月出生嘅小朋友，9月入學時只有2歲8個月大，兩者差距足足11個月。對於幼兒嚟講，幾個月嘅智能、行為、肌肉協調差異已經好大，所以「大仔」喺班裏面嘅表現跟「細仔」會有好大差距。 (children who born at the start of the year)

examples.text: 喺香港，好多入學競爭激烈嘅幼稚園會傾向收「大仔」。
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]In Hong Kong, many highly competitive kindergartens tend to prefer admitting older children.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
認為某人唔重要或者冇關連 (to treat someone as unimportant or irrelevant; literally: to treat as not there)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我唔出聲唔代表你可以當我冇到。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 ceot1 seng1 m4 doi6 biu2 nei5 ho2 ji5 dong3 ngo5 mou5 dou3.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]Just because I'm not talking doesn't mean you can treat me like I'm not here.

senses.definition: 見#頂唔順；比較少人用 (same as #頂唔順; relatively less used term)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我頂唔蒲打咗個冷震。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 ding2 m4 pou4 daa2 zo2 go3 laang5 zan3.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]I can't believe I caught a cold.

senses.definition: 打麻雀嗰陣，同其他玩家要同樣嘅牌，令牌局冇進展 ((of mahjong) stuck; unable to make progress; stalemate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 對死咗添！今鋪摸和啦實！
examples.jyutping: deoi3 sei2 zo2 tim1! gam1 pou1 mo2 wo4 laa1 sat6!
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]It's really dead here! Let's just close up shop for the day!

senses.definition: 秘密、唔公開嘅戀情（量詞：段） (secret love affair; literally: underground love)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 喺公司發展地下情，返工對住又唔認得，偷偷摸摸好辛苦。
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]Having an affair at work is tough, especially when you don't recognize each other in public.

senses.definition: #舔；#品嚐 (to lick; to taste)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 嗒住粒糖

senses.definition: 言語令人#細味，細心咁領會 (to ponder one's words)

examples.text: 嗒落有味
examples.translation: the message behind turns clear after one muses the words in one's mind

senses.definition: 形容一個人身材健碩，生得好大隻；略含貶義 ((slightly derogatory) a strongly-built man or woman; literally: big mule)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 大隻騾騾跌落坑渠
examples.jyutping: daai6 zek3 leoi4 leoi4 dit3 lok6 haang1 keoi4

senses.definition: 兩樣性質相近嘅嘢一齊嚟、同時嚟 (to have two of something at the same time)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 碟頭飯打孖上？餓鬼投胎咁款噃。
examples.jyutping: dip6 tau2 faan6 daa2 maa1 soeng5? ngo6 gwai2 tau4 toi1 gam2 fun2 bo3.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]Mixing leftover rice with fresh rice? That's like being reborn as a hungry ghost.

senses.definition: 問人而獲取資訊 (to ask about; to inquire about; try to find out)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你可唔可以幫我打探吓你公司請唔請人啊？
examples.jyutping: nei5 ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 bong1 ngo5 daa2 taam3 haa5 nei5 gung1 si1 ceng2 m4 ceng2 jan4 aa3?
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]Can you help me find out if your company is hiring or not?

senses.definition: 借代刻意浪費資源 (a metaphor for intentionally wasting valuable resources; literally: to dump into the sea)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我寧願攞啲錢倒落海都唔想幫垃圾養仔。
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]I would rather throw money into the sea than raise garbage.

senses.definition: 連接發電設備同用户嘅網絡 (electrical grid)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 屋企啲太陽能板可以申請接駁上電網。
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]You can apply to connect your home's solar panels to the power grid.

senses.definition: 形容某人鍾意自己一個，唔喜歡同人相處，就好似自己一個人成一條村 (solitary; self-isolated; lone)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢份人幾獨家村。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fan6 jan4 gei2 duk6 gaa1 cyun1.
examples.translation: He is kind of self-isolated.

senses.definition: 獨有、獨佔市場嘅 (unique; peculiarity)

examples.text: 呢類鄉村都係獨家村，得電盈提供寬頻服務。
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]"These rural areas are all exclusive villages, and only Dian Ying Ying provides broadband services.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
比較#低 嘅#價格 (in a low price)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 趁低價好快啲買喇。
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]Buy quickly while the price is low.

senses.definition: #蛋 外邊硬嘅部分 (egg shell)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 炒蛋入面有蛋殼係咩玩法？
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]What's the point of having eggshells in scrambled eggs?

senses.definition: 去到頂點，冇得再向上發展落去 (to reach the summit)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢區嘅交通流量已經到頂，唔可以再承受更多人口。
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]The traffic flow in this area has reached its limit and cannot accommodate any more people.

senses.definition: 較低嘅位置（通常指趨勢或價格） (low point (of a trend or price))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 日圓匯率跌至10個月低位
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]The yen exchange rate has dropped to a 10-month low.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
就算係 (even if)

examples.text: 我打預你鄧麗君，唔出就無獎。
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]I bet you Deng Lijun, if she doesn't come, there's no prize.

senses.definition: 特指香港大球場 (The Hong Kong Stadium)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用嚟講特定#時間；放喺#時針 指嘅數字之後；後面可以加上更加仔細嘅單位，例如#正 (zing3) （即係#沓正），#半（即係30分），#分針 指嘅數字（即係幾多個#字，但係 6 同 12 唔得），或者「～#分」、「#沓～」、「～個#字」、「～個#骨」等等 (o'clock; can be followed by more fine-grained units like #正 zing3 (on the dot), #半 bun3 (half-past), 個骨 go3 gwat1 (quarter hour), #沓 daap6 and 個字 go3 zi6 (5-minute increments), or #分 fan1 (minutes))

examples.jyutping: go3 sai3 lou6 hou2 caam2 gaa3, jat1 ceot1 sai3 zau6 bei2 keoi5 lou5 dau6 lou5 mou2 dam2 dai1 hai2 gu1 ji4 jyun2 mun4 hau2.

senses.definition: 使到；令某個人或者某樣嘢可以做某個動作或者處於某個狀態 (to cause or affect someone or something to be able to carry out a certain act or enter a certain state)

senses.definition: #針對 (to pick on; to pester)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai6 gam2 doeng1 zyu6 ngo5
